loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: Cecilia de 52 años vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y tiene una tienda, que inició desde hace 15 años. Cuando dio sus primeros pasos hacia la actividad comercial, estaba enfocada de vender ropa interior, porque estudiaba y se le facilitaba hacerlo de esa manera  y una vez contrajo matrimonio en el año 1980, Su esposo con una gran experiencia en el mercado, (porque trabajaba en un almacén) le aportó su saber y estimuló el emprendimiento de su negocio tiempo después. Así fue como, poco a poco, comprando sabanas, productos de aseo vendió a su primera clientela de vecinos con quienes le fue muy bien. Con sus ahorros fue adquiriendo una a una las vitrinas y empezó su diversificación de productos hasta llevarla a lo que es hoy en día “una tienda Miscelánea”  donde vende además de mercancía variada,  ranchos, víveres, refrescos, bebidas etc. En la actualidad su anhelo de crecer sigue latente y esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará útiles escolares y víveres, en mayor cantidad, aprovechando el primer trimestre del año, que es la época para vender estos productos y a ella tradicionalmente le va muy bien. Su meta es continuar creciendo y hacer mayor publicidad desde avisos con tecnología de punta. Con este negocio y el trabajo de Cecilia y  de su esposo han logrado sostener a su familia conformada por 2 hijos, hoy en las edades de 27 y 28 años respectivamente.
texts.en: 52-year-old Cecilia lives in the city of Cartagena and has a store which she set up 15 years ago.  When she took her first steps in business, she focused on selling underwear.  She was studying at the time and it was easier for her to do this.  When she got married in 1980 her husband, who had a lot of experience (because he used to work in a store,) shared his knowledge with her and encouraged her to start her own business.  She gradually bought sheets and toiletries which she sold to her first customers who were neighbors.  She did very well.  With her savings, she acquired display cabinets one by one and started to diversify her product range until she turned the business into what it is today a 'general store' where, in addition to a variety of merchandise, she also sells food, provisions, soft drinks, etc.  Right now, her wish is to continue growing her business and this is why she has requested a Kiva loan (her first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo).  She will use it to buy school supplies and food products in larger quantities, making the most of the fact that it is the first school term of the year which is a good time to sell these products.  Traditionally she has done very well at this.  Cecilia's goal is to continue growing her business and to promote it further with adverts via the latest technology.  With this business and both Cecilia and her husband's work, they have managed to support their two children who are now 27 and 28 years old.

loans.use: to buy school supplies and food products in larger quantities

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Ольга - фермер с многолетним опытом. Вместе с мужем она начала заниматься выращиванием овощей еще 20 лет назад. Вначале высаживали помидоры, редис и др. овощи в открытый грунт. Затем начали накрывать пленкой, строя маленькие теплицы. В связи с изменениями цен и сезонности (ранние овощи продавать намного выгодней) появиласть необходимость построить большую теплицу. Своих средств для этого не хватает. 

Ольга просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 10,000 гривен на установку большой теплицы для помидор. У Ольги с мужем много свой земли, где они планируют продолжать развивать свой овощной бизнес. 

Ольга живет в своем доме с младшей дочерью. Две старшие дочери вышли замуж, живут отдельно и любят приходить вместе с внуками в гости.
texts.en: Olga is a farmer with many years of experience.  Together with her husband, she started to grow vegetables 20 years ago.  At first, they planted tomatoes, radishes and other vegetables in the open ground.  Then, they started to cover the ground with plastic by building small greenhouses.  Due to the changes in prices and seasons (early vegetables are more profitable to sell), they now have the need to build a large greenhouse, but do not have their own means to do so.  Olga is requesting a loan in the sum of 10,000 hryvnia to install a large greenhouse for tomatoes.  Olga and her husband own a lot of land, where they plan to continue developing their vegetable business.  Olga lives in her own house with her youngest daughter.  Two of her older daughters got married, live separately and love to visit with grandchildren.

loans.use: to install a large greenhouse for tomatoes

loans.name: Sayyohat

texts.ru: Сайёхат проживает в Яванском районе. Ей 25 лет. Она не замужем. У нее среднее образование. Она у себя дома занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для покупки тканей.
texts.en: Sayyohat lives in the Yavan district.  She is 25 years old and single.  She has a secondary education.  Sayyohat is involved in sewing national dresses at home.  She has been in this business for three years.  She is requesting this loan to buy fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics

loans.name: Jose Justo

texts.es:
José Justo es un padre de familia de 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos, cuentan con casa propia en la que viven ubicada en el caserío que tiene por nombre “Ranchería II” ubicado a escasos minutos del Distrito de Morrope, el mismo que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque. El caserío en el que vive es pequeño de unas  50 familias aproximadamente y que solo cuentan con el servicio de energía Eléctrica.

José Justo se dedica exclusivamente a dar servicio de transporte, para lo que cuenta con una Mototaxy propia la cual recorre transportando pasajeros desde zonas rurales hasta las zonas urbanas, pues conoce a la perfección las vías de acceso entre caseríos lo que facilita su trabajo, adicionalmente también genera ingresos para su hogar criando, y vendiendo animales como ovinos, caprinos y aves de corral entre otros.

José Justo después de un determinado tiempo interna su vehiculo el taller para su  mantenimiento que corresponde, que consiste en cambio de llantas y entre otras piezas por lo que esta solicitando un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles lo que también invertirá en actualizar su documentación (Soat). 

José Justo también se genera otros ingresos dedicándose a actividades agropecuarios, y es que su responsabilidad y su esfuerzo por darles una mejor calidad de vida han hecho que se gane el respeto y cariño de todos sus vecinos de su caserío.
texts.en:
José Justo is a 39 year old father. He lives with his wife and their 3 children. They have their own home in which they live. It’s located in the village called “Rancheria II” located just minutes from the Morrope District, which is in the Lambayeque province. The village in which he lives is small with approximately 50 families, and they only have electric energy service. 

José Justo works exclusively providing transport service, and to do that he has his own moto-taxi which he operates transporting passengers from rural areas to urban areas, since he knows the access routes between the villages where he does his work. Additionally, he also earns money for his household by raising and selling animals like sheep, goats, poultry, etc. 

At one point José Justo took his car to the shop for regular maintenance, which consists of changing the tires and other items. For that reason he is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles which he will invest in the his update documentation (Soat). 

José Justo also earns income working in agriculture. Since it’s his responsibility and purpose to provide a better quality of life, he’s earned the respect and affection of all of his neighbors in the village.

loans.use: to buy tires and to update documents.

loans.name: Dionisia

texts.es:
Labora como Enfermera Especialista del Hospital Jacinto Hernandez desde hace 22 años, ella cuenta con la ayuda de su compañero de vida. Ambos trabajan para el Minsa y comparten con todos los deberes familiares y crediticios.

Solicita su 6to crèdito para construcciòn de una habitacion para su hija mayor y  este le vendria a brindar mejor comodidad en el hogar.   

Dionicia se siente muy agradecida  ya que por medio de los crèditos obtenidos han mejorado sus condiciones de vida y de su familia. Su mayor sueño en la vida es mejorar sus condiciones de vida, seguir ayudando a su familia y que su hijas sigan estudiando para que sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Dionesia has worked as a nursing specialist at the Jacinto Hernandez Hospital for 22 years now. She can also count on the help of her life companion. Both of them work for Minsa (the Health Ministry) and they share all the family and credit responsibilities.

Dionesia is requesting her 6th loan in order to build a habitation for her eldest daughter and this will result in greater comfort in their own house.

Dionicia feels very grateful because, due to the loans she has received, they have been able to improve the family's living conditions. The most important dreams of her life are to continue improving their living conditions, helping her family, and for her daughters to continue studying so that they can be better off as persons.

loans.use: make more room at home by building a house for her daughter.

loans.name: Chadia Vanessa

texts.es: Chadya de 19 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y desde hace dos años su padre inició un negocio de café internet, que luego se lo dio a ella,  para que generara sus propios ingresos  pagara sus estudios universitarios  y fortaleciera su autonomía.  Su negocia ha salido adelante porque satisface las necesidades de comunicación virtual en su comunidad, pues muy pocas personas tienen computadores o medios tecnológicos que hoy son estrictamente necesarios para todos, por eso  desde un estudiante hasta una ama de casa va a este negocio y compra los servicios que Chadya ofrece, como tareas en internet, juegos divertidos, promoción, comunicación mediante redes sociales etc. Su meta es ampliarlo y en el futuro tener una sucursal en otro  barrio de la ciudad que también lo necesite. Su mayor desafío es que ante la creciente demanda,  ella requiere tener un número mayor de equipos y un amplio espacio, porque como lo tiene está estrecho. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, el cual aplicará en adecuaciones de su local, moverá una pared , que dará mayor amplitud,  para introducir mas equipos, que respondan a la demanda creciente que hace su clientela.
texts.en: Chadya is 19 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena. Two years ago her father began an internet café business which he later gave to her so that she could earn her own income, pay for her university education, and become more independent. Her business has gotten ahead because she meets the virtual communication needs of her community since very few people have computers or technological means which today are absolutely necessary for everyone. For that reason, everyone from students to housewives come to this business and pay for the services that Chadya offers, like internet work, fun games, special offers, communication through social networks, etc. Her goal is to expand and in the future have a branch in another neighborhood of the city that also needs it. Her main challenge is that before growth demands it, she needs to have more computers and a larger space because that which she has is tight. This is just the reason why she’s applied for a Kiva loan which she will use for improvements to her shop and to move a wall which will give her more space in order to bring in more equipment that will meet the growing demand of her clientele.

loans.use: to pay for improvements to her shop and to move a wall which will give her shop more space

loans.name: Katia Ninoska

texts.es: katia Ninoska habita junto a su familia en Nueva Guinea, tiene su propio negocio donde obtiene ingresos que le permiten cumplir con sus obligaciones y los gastos del hogar, ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo para los gastos familiar y asumir sus cuotas mensual.  Katia se caracteriza por ser una joven de buenos principios religiosos, ademas por ser muy responsable, le gusta ser emprendedora profesionalmente, pues es graduada en administradora de empresa.  Esta solicitando su 2do crèdito para comprar un solar donde va ha construir su propia vivienda pues actualmente vive en casa de sus padres, es una joven que le gusta superar su nivel de vida y y el de su familia.
texts.en: Katia Ninoska lives together with her family in Nueva Guinea.  She has her own business which makes her the income she needs to cover her bills and expenses.  She also has the support of her husband in covering their family expenses and meeting her monthly payments.  Katia is a young woman of good religious principles.  She is also very responsible.  She enjoys being a professional entrepreneur as she is a business management graduate.  She is requesting her second loan to buy a plot of land on which to build her own home as she currently lives with her parents.  She is a young woman who would like to improve her own standard of living as well as that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Bilha

texts.en:
Bilha has practiced farming in Nyahururu for the last 23 years. She is 47 years old, married and together she and her husband have two school-going children.  

She was introduced to KADET  LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to purchase  farm inputs.

In future, Bilha hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Nyahururu.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Andrey

texts.ru:
Андрей торгует автозапчатями на автомобили: автооптика, тормозные цилиндры, колодкия, пр. Благодаря предыдущему кредиту он увеличил оборотные средства и таким образом привлек свободные денежные средства от продажи для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса. Конкурентное преимущетво Андрея в том, что у него больший выбор запчастей по минимальной цене по сравнению с конкурентами соседями по рынку.

Конец зимы и начало весны - время ремонта автомобилей после зимней эксплуатации. В этом году были трудные погодные условия (мороз, много снега и гололеда), поэтому спрос на запчасти будет большой. Андрей просит предоставить ему кредит с целью увеличения ассортимента продукции.
texts.en: Andrey sells automotive spare parts, such as lights, brake discs and pads and other.  Thanks to his last loan, he increased his working capital and, therefore, was able to use the freed-up funds from sales for continued expansion of his business.  Andrey's competitive advantage is the fact that he has a wide selection of spare parts at minimal prices compared to competing market neighbors.  End of winter and beginning of spring is the time to repair cars after the winter use.  This year, there were hard weather conditions (frost, a lot of snow and ice), and this is why the demand for spare parts will be high.  Andrey is requesting this loan to expand his merchandise selection.

loans.use: to expand the selection of spare parts

loans.name: 25-Honor Y Gloria Villa Fatima Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendiendo  25-HONOR Y GLORIA VILLA FATIMA, esta compuestos por ocho integrantes seis  mujeres y dos varones El presidente de la mesa directiva es el Sr. Edgar Tiene 56 años y es casado con 2 hijos ya independientes, el se dedica a la actividad de fotógrafo y también  realiza filmaciones y edición de videos, camarógrafos, en distintas actividades sociales y culturales, se dedica  esta actividad hace ya bastantes años su negocio el préstamo que solicito con la institución lo utilizara   para compra de material de una filmadora para su negocio, es que se  incremento en la demanda de filmaciones de acontecimientos sociales y otros.  Enfrenta retos en su negocio que son realizar trabajos de calidad y prestigio utilizara los beneficios implementando nuevas maquinas para su negocio.
texts.en:
The '25-HONOR Y GLORIA VILLA FATIMA' community bank has eight members: six women and two men.  The president of the group's board of directors is Edgar.

Edgar is 56 years old, married, and has two children who are no longer dependent on him.  He works as a photographer and also does filming and video editing work.  In addition, he provides video camera work at different social and cultural events.  He has been in this business for some years now.  Edgar requested a loan from the institution to buy materials (a movie camera) for his business as his demand for filming social events and other events has risen.  The challenge that Edgar faces in his business is creating high-quality work.  He will use the profits he makes to buy new equipment for his business.

loans.use: to buy materials (a movie camera)

loans.name: Kurbonbi

texts.ru: Курбонби проживает в городе Куляб. Она более восьми лет занимается торговлей. Ей 46 лет. Курбонби продает детскую и женскую одежду. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Она берет кредит для покупки костюмчиков и свитеров.
texts.en: Kurbonbi lives in the city of Kulob.  She has been involved in sales for over eight years.  She is 46 years old.  Kurbonbi sells children's and women's clothing.  She is married and has one child.  She is requesting this loan to buy suits and sweaters.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Dilmurod

texts.ru: Дилмуроду 26 лет, разведен. Он разводит крупно рогатый скот. У него также есть 1 гектар земли, где он выращивает огурцы помидоры и бахчевые культуры. Дилмурод занимается откормом скота с детства. Его мама находиться в России на заработке, отца нет в живых. Она присылает ему деньги на постройку нового дома. Он также планирует купить на полученный кредит коровы.  Зимой его скот похудел от нехватки корма, поэтому ему необходимо купить и корм для скота.
texts.en: Dilmurod is 26 years old and divorced.  He breeds cattle.  He also has a hectare of land, where he grows cucumbers, tomatoes and melon crops.  Dilmurod has been involved in livestock fattening up since childhood.  His mother is working in Russia, and father passed away.  She sends him money to build a new house.  Dilmurod also plans to buy cattle with this loan.  His livestock lost weight during the winter due to the lack of fodder, and this is why he needs to buy livestock feed too.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and feed

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es: Pablo habitante de la comarca cerro Bonito, labora como docente donde imparte el pan de la enseñanza a los niños de la comunidad, además posee una pequeña parcela donde siembra granos para el consumo familiar algunos animalitos que le generan ingresos adicionales durante el año. Solicita su 1er crédito a AFODENIC, para compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar su vivienda, y tener mejores condiciones en el hogar.  Pablo se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador con mucho deseo de superación, con principios religioso, lider en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Pablo lives in Cerro Bonito district.  He works as a teacher, teaching the children in his community.  He also has a small plot of land where he grows grains for his own family's consumption.  He also has some animals which make him additional income throughout the year.

Pablo is requesting his first loan from AFODENIC to buy building materials with which to improve his home so that his household can enjoy better living conditions.  Pablo is noted as being a hard-working man who has a great desire to do well.  He is a man of good religious principles and is a leader in his community.

loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Jamedith Del Carmen

texts.es: Jamedith del Socorro habitante de la comarca cerro Bonito, se desempeña como docentes impartiendo el pan de la enseñanza a los niños de su comunidad, también posee su parcela e inventario de ganado gracias a la herencia que sus padres le dejaron;  solicita su 2do crédito con el objetivo de comprar materiales de construccion para mejorar su vivienda repellandola  para asì tener mejores condiciones para su familia, en el créditos anterior ha demostrado ser una excelente clienta, posee capacidad y voluntad de pago, su sueño es finalizar su construcciòn de su casa de habitaciòn, recibiendo su financiamiento.
texts.en: Jamedith del Socorro lives in Cerro Bonito district.  She works as a teacher, teaching the children in her community.  She also has a plot of land and some livestock thanks to an inheritance from her parents.  She is requesting her second loan with the aim of buying building supplies with which to improve her home.  She will plaster her home and thereby create better living conditions for her family.  She showed herself to be an excellent client over the course of her previous loans.  She has the ability and will to make her repayments and her dream is to use her loan to finish building her home.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Hurshed

texts.ru: Хуршид 1981 года рождения, он женат, имеет 2 детей. Он раньше ездил в Российскую Федерацию и зарабатывал там, но по каким то обстоятельствам он не смог дальше там работать. Но дома  его семья содержали скот и с весны по осень выращивали различные сельхоз продукты.  Он также перестал ездить в Россию и начал помогать разводить коров. Сейчас благодаря нашей поддержки у него 7 коров. Получив у нас кредит, планирует прикупить до весны еще одну пару. А после откорма или когда придет время продавать скот, он их продаст и от полученной прибыли он на арендованном  участке земли  посадит  огурцы, помидор и капусту, а позже бахчевую культуру. Так он старается, что бы у него постоянно был доход.
texts.en: Hurshed was born 1981.  He is married and has two children.  Previously, he used to go to the Russian Federation and work there, but due to unknown circumstances, he was no longer able to work there.  At home, his family kept livestock and grew various agricultural crops from spring to autumn.  He also stopped going to Russia and began helping them to breed cattle.  Currently, thanks to our support, Hurshed has seven cows.  He plans to buy another pair of cows before spring after obtaining this loan.  He will sell them after fattening them up or when the time comes to sell livestock, and will use the resulting profit to plant cucumbers, tomatoes and cabbage, and also melon crops on a leased plot of land.  This is how Hurshed tries to have a regular income.

loans.use: to buy two cows

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La señora Sonia esta solicitando un crédito con nosotros para poder invertir en su pequeño negocio de tacos de guisados, el cual le obtiene suficiente ganancias para mantener a sus dos hijos, ya que es madre soltera.
Doña Sonia es originaria de Nuevo León, pero ya tiene mas de doce años vivienda en la ciudad Nuevo Laredo, lugar donde para sustentar a sus hijos tuvo que ver la diferentes maneras de poder ganar dinero sin descuidar a su familia.  Así que decidió dedicarse al comercio, empezó a vender tacos por las calles en su carro y poco a poco pudo comprar un puesto y establecer su negocio de tacos, solicita el préstamo para invertir en comprar inmobiliario que es mesas y sillas, y así sus clientes estarán mas cómodos al estar consumiendo sus rico y deliciosos tacos.
texts.en:
Sonia is requesting a loan from us to invest in her small business selling 'tacos de guisados'.  This business makes her enough profits to support her two children as she is a single mother.  Sonia is from Nuevo León but she has lived in Nuevo Laredo for more than twelve years.  This is where she has had to support her children by looking at different ways she could make money without neglecting her family.  She decided to start working in commerce.  She began selling tacos in the streets from her car and was gradually able to buy a stall and set up her taco business there.

Sonia is requesting this loan to invest in buying furniture for her business (tables and chairs) so that her customers will be more comfortable when they are eating her rich and delicious tacos.

loans.use: to invest in buying furniture for her business

loans.name: Tolibjon

texts.ru: Толибчону 27 лет, он женат имеет одного сына. Толибчон занимается изготовлением мебели и различных национальных столиков. У него есть большой заказ на изготовление национальных столиков, они маленькие и низкие. Многие зимой используют этот столик, укрывая его одеялом для обогревания комнаты. Жена Толибчон сидит дома, она воспитывает ребенка.  Толибчон начал заниматься этим делом год назад и уже имеет большое количество клиентов. Он очень благодарен Арванду за финансовую поддержку, раньше он приобретал древесину в рассрочку ему это обходилось дорого. А теперь он получив кредит может покупать свои материалы на наличные и подешевле.
texts.en: Tolibjon is 27 years old, married and has one son.  Tolibjon is involved in making furniture and various national tables.  He has a large order to make national tables, which are small and low.  Many use this type of table in the winter to heat up a room by covering it with a blanket.  Tolibjon's wife stays home and raises their child.  Tolibjon started this business one year ago and already has many clients.  He is very grateful to Arvand for the financial support because he previously bought wood with credit, which was expensive.  And now, having obtained the loan, he can buy his materials with cash and cheaper.

loans.use: to purchase raw material - wood

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph has been extracting stones from quarries in Naivasha town for the last four years.  He is 31 years old, married and the father of two children, both of whom are enrolled in school. He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. He plans to use it to buy another quarry and employ casual workers so that he may increase his production. Someday, he hopes to own a large quarry.

loans.use: to buy another quarry and hire casual workers to increase his production.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en: Lilian has been in the business of selling charcoal in Naivasha town for the last five years. She is 47 years old, married and the mother of one child. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan. She plans to use it to buy more charcoal to sell to her customers. In the future, Lilian hopes to expand her business and supply charcoal to other parts of Naivasha.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира проживает в Яванском районе. Возраст, 31 лет. Замужем. Имеет троих детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Сама она по специальности портниха. Уже три года Мунира занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Кредит берет для приобретения однотонных материалов.
texts.en: Munira lives in the Yavan Region. She is 31 years old. Married, with three children. Her husband is in the Russian Federation. She is a seamstress by trade. For the last three years, Munira has been sewing traditional national clothing. She is taking out a loan in order to buy solid-color cloth.

loans.use: to buy solid-color cloth.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.en: Viviana lives in the town of Yambio. She sells charcoal, and has been in this business for four years. She is 40 years old, married and has three children, one of whom attends school. Viviana heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and is requesting her second loan, for 1,000 SDG, to buy charcoal to sell. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her child's school fee.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is married and the father of two children. He describes himself as principled, and earns a living by providing transportation services with his taxi. He has been in this business for one year and employs one person. His business is located in a busy area, and his biggest challenge is the high cost of fuel. He will use this loan, for Kes 20,000, to buy spare parts. His goal is to own another car within five years.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy raw materials for making 'guipiles' (traditional blouses)

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma is 25 years old and earns a living by running a sari-sari store in Trinidad, Bohol. She is married and has no children yet. Her husband works as a farmer. Emma has had her business for five years and sells bread, vinegar, soy sauce and toiletries. She also helps her husband sell his harvest at their town's market. Emma works hard to improve their living situation and save for the future. She plans to use her loan to buy fertilizer and more items to sell such as bread and canned goods. In the future, Emma hopes to have a stable business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and more items to sell.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Doris, de 30 años, es una mujer buena, amable y trabajadora, es conviviente con Dimas de 60 años con quien tiene cinco hijos, Adriana de 14, Susan de 8, Deydra de 4, Patrick de 3 y el menor Fernando de 1 años y medio, ellos viven en su casa propia y trabaja mucho pues desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
A diario, Doris después de hacer las tareas de su hogar se dirige a las diversas calles de la ciudad, va en busca de encontrar a nuevos clientes o cerrar trato con los clientes antiguos con los que trabaja hace ya bastante tiempo, se dedica a la venta de productos de limpieza, para el hogar o para el cuidado personal, su modalidad de trabajo es al crédito o al contado, según como el cliente desee obtener sus buenos y excelentes productos. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 5 años, lo hace sola. Le va muy bien, ya que tiene muchos clientes que en el transcurso del tiempo gano gracias a su excelente trato, siempre amable y sobre dando todas las facilidades que necesite el cliente al momento de adquirir alguno de sus productos. Espera seguir teniendo el mismo éxito que tuvo hasta ahora y poder seguir con el crecimiento de su negocio, mas adelante le gustaría poner una tienda de abarrotes para poder incrementar sus productos y así tener mejores ventas. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y responsable. Además está muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal ya que  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mas mercadería para que pueda continuar con su trabajo y ofrecer mayor cantidad y variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
30-year-old Doris is a good, kind and hardworking woman. She lives with 60-year-old Dimas, with whom she has five children - Adriana, aged 14, Susan, aged 8, Deydra, aged 4, Patrick, aged 3 and the youngest, Fernando, aged 1 and a half. They live in a house she owns and she works very hard to improve her family's living conditions.
Every day, after taking care of her home chores, Doris goes out to the streets of her town where she searches for new customers or closes deals with the old customers, with whom she has been working for a long time. She sells cleaning products, both for house cleaning and for personal hygiene. She does business on credit or cash, depending on how the customer wishes to obtain her excellent products. She has been in this line of work for five years and she does it alone. It's going very well, since she gained a lot of customers along the way, thanks to the excellent service she provides. She's always friendly and facilitates everything for the customers when they purchase one of her products. She hopes to continue having the same success she has had so far and to keep on expanding her business. In the future she would like to set up a grocery store so that she can increase her merchandise and make higher sales. This will be her second loan with MFP, so she hopes to get your collaboration in order to keep on pursuing her goals. On the other hand, she pledges to make her repayments in a timely and responsible fashion. Furthermore, she's very glad to be a part or her communal bank, since all of the members are responsible and very supportive people. With the requested loan of 1.500 soles, she will purchase more merchandise in order to continue her work and to offer a larger quantity and variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise in order to stock up her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build an annex onto her home.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La señora Yanet solicita un crédito para comprar el vitropiso y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejorar. 
Desea mejorar el patrimonio de sus dos hijas que tiene y que estén en mejores condiciones para el bien estar y la comodidad para su familia. 
 Doña Yanet trabaja como supervisora en una tienda comercial, y su esposo es chofer de un camión de carretera, los dos se apoyan en los gastos económicos y escolares de su familia.
texts.en:
Yanet is requesting a loan to buy tiled flooring and to pay the people who will carry out this improvement for her.

Yanet would like to improve her two daughters' inheritance and to improve the condition of her home for her family's comfort.

Yanet works as a supervisor in a store.  Her husband drives a truck.  The couple support each other in covering their financial expenses and their family's educational expenses.

loans.use: to lay tiled flooring

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
La Sra. Ramona es de la ciudad de San Ignacio. Ella cuenta con una Despensa en su casa. Ella, tiene 3 hijos, su pareja es pescador y  ambos llevan adelante la familia con esfuerzo y mucho trabajo.
Ramona nos dice que ambos trabajan arduamente para poder dar a sus hijos todo lo que ellos necesitan para tener una buena educación y de esa forma se conviertan en buenos profesionales.
Ella pide la ayuda de fundación paraguaya y de kiva para la compra de comestibles, bebidas y demás artículos de primera necesidad. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que recibe, pues le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Ramona comes from the town of San Ignacio. She has 3 children, she runs a small store in her house, and she and her husband, a fisherman, provide for their family with hard work and great effort.
Ramona tells us that she and her husband work hard in order to provide their childbed with everything they need to have a good education, so that they can become efficient professionals.
She is asking for help from Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva to buy edible products, drinks and other basic necessities. She is thankful to the foundation for the chance she is being given, as it will be of great help for her.

loans.use: To buy edible products and drinks for her activity.

loans.name: Quebrada Seca Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento Quebrada Seca se encuentra conformada por ocho integrantes de las cuales todas son mujeres que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta es la Sra. Yraida  tiene 44 años no es casada pero convive  con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos que son 2 y 17años, ella se dedica a la   venta de ropa de forma ambulante en un mercado muy concurrido de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, se encuentra en su tercera secuencia, La Sra. Yraida usara este préstamo la compra de ropa de temporada por mayor y así de esta manera  aumentar capital de trabajo, Yraida  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son crecer en clientela. Va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar  la calidad de vida con el tiempo desea tener un puesto fijo, se encuentra feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The Quebrada Seca entrepreneurship bank has eight members who are all women. They all do different activities for a living. The president is Yraida. She is 44 years old. She is not married but lives with her partner. She has two children who are 2 and 17 years old. She is a street vendor who sells clothing at a very busy market in the city of Santa Cruz. She is in her third sequence. Yraida will use this loan to purchase seasonal wholesale clothing. This purchase allows her to increase her working capital. Yraida faces the challenge of increasing her customer base. She is going to use the benefits to improve her quality of life in time. She wants to have a permanent stall. She is happy and grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: purchase seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Elisa Lexania

texts.es: Elisa Lexania de 27 años de edad es casada, trabaja como maestra de primaria en el Colegio Enrique Tierno Galvan desde hace 8 años.  Esta solicitando  su 3er credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando las condiciones en su casa, construyendo otro cuarto pero en la parte trasera de la casa, pues con el credito anterior logro construir en la parte de enfrente de su casa un cuarto que le ha brindado mayor comodidad a su familia, cuenta con una parte de materiales pero necesita comprar arena, hierro, cemento y el pago de la mano de obra.  Elisa se ha caracterizado por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos, y es muy querida por sus compañeros de trabajo.  Sueña con poder ver su casa con mayores comodidades para que sus hijas se desarrollen en un ambiente agradable.
texts.en: Elisa Lexania is 27 years old and married. She’s worked as an elementary school teacher in Colegio Enrique Tierno Galvan for eight years. She is asking for her third loan to continue improving her home, building another room in the back part of the house. With the previous loan she was able to build a room in the front part of the house which brought much comfort to her family. She has some of the materials but she needs to buy sand, iron, cement, and pay for labor. Elisa has been described as being very responsible with her commitments, and she is well liked by her colleagues. She dreams of being able to see her home with better comforts so that her daughters grow up in a good environment.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Elda

texts.es:
Elda, de 33 años, es una mujer amable, buena y muy dinámica, está casada con Gerson de 40 años y con el tiene cuatro menores hijos, Paulo de 15, Liz de 10, Jenifer de 7 y la menor Jazmin de 3 años, ella trabaja mucho ya que desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Juntos habitan en su casa propia compartiendo las cosas buenas y afrontando las dificultades que se presentan. El trabajo de Elda consiste en la venta de comida regional, a diario sale a la vereda de su casa y col oca las mesas, sillas y demás materiales necesarios para empezar con su venta, a diario tiene muchos clientes que van en busca de sus deliciosos platos que con sus manos bendecidas de buena sazón prepara, lo importante es que ofrece todo tipo y variedad de platos, desde los mas comunes hasta los mas raros, siempre el cliente encuentra ahí lo que va a buscar y sale contento, pues ella siempre les brinda una linda sonrrisa y trato especial a todos. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por tres años y durante éste tiempo aprendió que al cliente que le tratas bien, regresa mas seguido.
Recuerda como se inicio con éste negocio, fue a raíz de los pocos ingresos que percibian por tanto decidió emprender éste negoocio sin descuidar su casa ni mucho menos a sus hijos, ahora tiene muchos planes en mente, pero lo que por ahora desea es consolidar su negocio y mas adelante empezar con su ampliación. Este será el quinto crédito con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá más segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos sus integrantes con personas responsables y muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará ingredientes para continuar con la preparación de sus diversos platos de comida, a parte invertirá algún monto en cambiar sus utensilios y reforzar la seguridad de su local.
texts.en:
33-year-old Elda is a good, kind and very dynamic woman. She's married to 40-year-old Gerson, with whom she has four underage children - Paulo, aged 15, Liz, aged 10, Jenifer, aged 7, and the youngest, Jazmin, aged 3. She works very hard because she wishes to improve their living conditions. They live together in a house they own, where they share the good things and face the difficulties that come their way. Elda's work is selling regional food. Every day she goes out to the sidewalk in front of her home and sets up the tables, chairs and all the supplies she needs in order to start selling. Every day she gets a lot of customers who come searching for the delicious dishes she prepares with her own hands which are very skilled at seasoning. The most important thing is that she offers all kinds and varieties of dishes, from the most common to the most rare ones. Her customers always find what they search for and leave satisfied, because she always greets them all with special service and a beautiful smile. She has been in this line of work for three years and during this time she learned that a well-treated customer is one who will come back often.
She remembers when she got her start in this business. Because they had a low income, she decided to start this business without neglecting her home and, most of all, her children. She currently has many plans, but what she wants for now is to consolidate her business and to begin expanding it in the future. This will be her fifth loan with MFP. She's very glad to know she will have financial support, because this way she will feel more confident as she moves forward with her work. Besides, she enjoys being a part of her communal bank, since all of the members are responsible and very supportive people. With the requested amount of 3.000 soles, she will purchase ingredients so that she can continue preparing her various food dishes. Also, she will invest part of it in getting new kitchenware and providing more security for her venue.

loans.use: to purchase food making supplies and to renew her kitchenware.

loans.name: Akouemevo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AKOUEMEVO est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Mireille, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Mireille est âgée de 40 ans et est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Gauthier. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Mireille vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Mireille assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la famille. Mireille n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a huit ans que Mireille mène comme activité, la vente de colliers et des produits cosmétiques de façon ambulante. Mireille s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire et son revenu, Mireille sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AKOUEMEVO, un septième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group AKOUEMEVO is comprised of three persons who reside in the same district. The group’s representative, Mireille, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 40 years old and married to a furniture maker by the name of Gauthier. They have three children, all in school and in their care. Mireille lives together with her husband and children. She and her husband jointly ensure that the diverse family expenses are covered. 

Mireille did not attend school. For eight years, she has been running a business selling necklaces and cosmetics door to door. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Mireille and the other members of the group AKOUEMEVO are requesting a seventh loan from ALIDé. The loans previously received have indeed been repaid.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and necklaces

loans.name: El Buen Pastor Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal está conformado por 8 emprendedores que se unieron para salir adelante y apoyarse unos a otros motivándose y bridándose  consejos para sus negocios. Este grupo ya han trabajo con Fundación León 2000 en crédito lo cual ha demostrado ser unas persona con buenos valores y con record crediticio intachable, estos emprendedores nos expresan que con el financiamiento que se le otorgo aumentaron sus clientes y mercadería y están contentos con el apoyo que se le otorgo. Martha es parte de grupo, la actividad a la que se dedica es a una pulpería lo cual está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de productos para el negocio, se comprara granos básicos, jabón, aceite, detergente, shampoo, golosinas, bolis entre otros productos.
texts.en: The communal bank is made up of 8 entrepreneurs who have gotten together to forge ahead and support each other by motivating and offering advice for their businesses.  This group has worked with Fundación León 2000 for loans before and have shown that they are people with good values and with an excellent credit record.  These entrepreneurs tell us that the financing has helped them increase their customer base and merchandise and they are happy with the support given them.  Martha is part of this group and she has a general store for which she is requesting a loan to buy products for the business.  She will buy basic grains, soap, oil, detergent, shampoo, sweets, ballpoint pens, etc.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soap, oil, detergent, shampoo, sweets, ballpoint pens, etc

loans.name: Abdukayum

texts.ru: Абдукаюм 34 года, он женат, имеет 2 детей. Работает в котельной оператором, но так как заработная плата не большая тfкже занимается откормом скота. Он разводит скот в течении восьми лет. Получает первый кредит у нас на покупку скота. Его жена домохозяйка. Дети и жена помогают в разведении скота. Его жена доит корову и продает местным жителям молочные продукты, так у них круглый год есть доход. Его жене нравиться помогать Абдукаюму, потому что он тоже любит свою работу и заниматься разведением скота.
texts.en: Abdukayum is 34 years old, married and has two children.  He works as an operator in a boiler room, but because his salary is small, he is also involved in fattening up livestock.  He has been breeding livestock for eight years.  This is his first loan for a purchase of livestock with us.  His wife is a homemaker.  Children and wife help with breeding livestock.  The wife milks the cow and sells milk products to local residents, thus, providing an income year around.  His wife likes to help Abdukayum because he also loves his work and the livestock business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La señora Marina tiene 43 años de edad, está casada con el señor Cesar, tienen 2 hijos ya mayores de edad e independientes, viven en una barrio muy cercano al centro de la ciudad de Itá.
Ella tiene varias vacas lecheras de las cuales ordeña y vende a despensas de la zona y particulares varios litros de leche por día, además posee un negocio en su domicilio, se dedica a la venta de bebidas en general como gaseosa, cerveza, jugos, golosinas y venta de saldo para teléfonos celulares.
La señora Marina cuenta con el apoyo de su marido quien lo ayuda en la alimentación y cuidado de las vacas, también le cuida el negocio cuando ella realiza la distribución de leche.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosa, cerveza, jugos, golosinas y demás productos para la posterior venta a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Marina is 43 years old. She is married to Señor Cesar, and they have two children who are already adults and independent. They live in a neighborhood very close to the center of the city of Itá.

She has several milk cows that she milks, and she sells a number of liters of milk every day to convenience stores in her area and to individuals. In addition, she has a business in her home. She sells beverages in general, such as soft drinks, beer, and juices, and she also sells candies and minutes for cell phones. 

Señora Marina has the support of her husband, who helps her with the feeding and care of the cows. He also tends the business when she is distributing milk.

She is applying for the loan to buy soft drinks, beer, juices, candies, and other products to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, beer, juices, candies, and other products

loans.name: Dianan Carolina

texts.es: Diana  de 22 años es una joven emprendedora, que hizo sus primeros pininos como empresaria con su madre, también muy emprendedora y propietaria de  una microempresa, de la que hace 4 años se independizó, ubicándola en la esquina del edificio donde habita. Allí  vende productos fritos y jugos  de frutas naturales; Diana ha construido poco a poco su clientela fija y como esta en un sitio muy transitado, también cuenta con  clientes ocasionales. La calidad de los productos, la higiene en el proceso productivo y su vocación de servicio son los elementos que hacen que sus clientes se fidelicen y refieran a otros. En la actualidad quiere diversificarlo un poco y agregarle un nuevo producto, la pizza, por la cual preguntan y con la que ella está segura, aumentaría sus ventas. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará un horno para pizza, una estufa e insumos para ese mismo proceso. Con su inversión logrará mayor éxito del acostumbrado, porque el producto que introducirá genera una buena demanda en el sector  y ella responderiá a ella
texts.en: Diana, 22 years old, is a young entrepreneur who took her first steps as a businesswoman with her mother who was also very enterprising and the owner of a small business. Four years ago she went solo, working at the corner of the building where she lives. There she sells fried products and natural fruit juices. Diana has slowly built up her regular customer base, and as she’s in a much traveled spot, she also has occasional customers. The product quality, the cleanliness of the production process, and her service skills are the elements that make her customers come back and refer others. Right now she wants to diversify a little and add a new product, pizza, which the customers ask for and which she’s sure will increase her sales. This is that reason that she comes to Kiva, first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and with that she’ll buy a pizza oven, a stove, and ingredients for that very process. With her investment she’ll be more successful than what she’s accustomed to because the product that she will introduce generates a great demand in the area and she will respond to it.

loans.use: to buy a pizza oven, a stove, and ingredients.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 37 years old. He is married to Rachel and together they have two children. He operates a hardware business in Rironi area and has been in the business for the past year.

This is his third term loan in KADET LTD. He paid his previous loans successfully. He will use the loan amount to purchase tires to add on stock in his business.

His dream is to own a supermarket in the area.

loans.use: to purchase tires for sale

loans.name: Ferlina

texts.es: Ferlina de 57 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comidas a domicilio, desde hace 4 años cuando inició con desayunos almuerzos y comidas especiales. Su mercado  son principalmente  trabajadores de la empresa donde trabaja su hija, que tiene una base de empleados de gran tamaño, quienes  poco a poco han ido incrementando su confianza en las deliciosos platos que prepara y con ello su fidelidad, en su negocio Ferlina  tiene un empleado que le ayuda a transportar los almuerzos, mientras ella  esta en todo el proceso productivo. En el estado de resultados del negocio de Ferlina,  se observa que presenta un nivel de ventas que le permite cubrir los gastos operacionales;  su balance general refleja que sus activos corrientes están  representados en efectivo y cuentas por cobrar y aunque  sus ventas  generalmente las realiza  de contado,  también  hace créditos a sus mejores  y más fieles clientes que así lo requieran. Su mayor desafío es lograr un capital de trabajo suficiente para mejorar sus procesos, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una estufa industrial, implementos de cocina y materias primas en mayor volumen. Esta inversión será exitosa porque planea hacerla en un mayor volumen y de contado, lo cual disminuye sus costos productivos; ella  debe  ser competitiva y estar muy bien preparada con su infraestructura y con una oferta agradable a sus clientes.
texts.en: Ferlina, 57, has a catering business. She began her business 4 years ago with breakfast, lunch and special dishes. Her main clientele are the many employees at the company where her daughter works, who have begun to trust, little by little, in her ability to make delicious meals. Ferlina employs someone to help transport the meals, while she is in full production. The results of her business present a level of sales that allow her to cover her operating costs. Her income is in cash, though she has some monies still owed to her because although she generally accepts only cash, some of her most loyal clients pay by credit. The toughest part is getting enough work capital together to improve her process, that’s why she is requesting her 1st Kiva loan through the Maria Santo Domingo Foundation. With this loan, she will buy an industrial stove, kitchen utensils and a large volume of basic ingredients. This is an exciting investment because she plans on buying product in large volume and by cash, which will lower her production costs. She wants to be competitive and well prepared with a strong business infrastructure and good offerings for her clients.

loans.use: buy an industrial stove, kitchen utensils and a large volume of basic ingredients.

loans.name: Meriatu

texts.en: This is 46 year-old Meriatu.  She is married to an accountant, and has three children who are 25, 20 and 16 years old, respectively. In 2006, Meriatu   established her provision and drinks business. She began her business because she was a civil servant but retired and went to Ivory Cost to seek a visa for the USA. Unfortunately, she was denied a visa and when she came back home there was no job. Therefore, with her remaining money, she decided to go into business. Working 15 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,200,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 4,500,000. Meriatu requires a loan in order to buy 20 crates of soft drinks @ Le 27, 000, 20 crates of maultina (a beer) @ Le 35,000, 8 cartons of sardines @ Le 174,000, and 10 cartons of peak milk @ Le 148, 000. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 1,000,000. In the future, Meriatu plans to see her business expand and her children educated to the university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, maultina, sardines and peak milk

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 46 years old. She is married to Phanuel and together they have two school-going children. She sells second hand clothes and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

She was brought to KADET LTD by a staff member. This is her first loan and she will use the loan to purchase second hand jackets for resale.

She hopes to open another outlet in the future.

loans.use: to purchase second hand jackets for resale.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret has operated her retail shop in Nakuru town for the last 10 years. She is 39 years old, married to Peter and they have three children.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to buy more goods for sale in her retail shop like flour, sugar, rice, and cooking fat.

In the future, she hopes to grow her retail shop to wholesale.

loans.use: to add stock of flour, sugar, rice, and cooking fat

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian has been in the vegetable sales business in Nakuru town for the last 5 years. She is 30 years old, married to Raphael and they have two children.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers during awareness and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to buy more stock of cabbages and kale for sale in her business.

In the future, Lilian hopes to expand her business and supply vegetables to other parts of Nakuru.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cabbages and kale for sale

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria es la propietaria de una tienda ubicada  al sur occidente de la ciudad, donde habita con sus dos hijas en las edades de 15 y 18 años; su negocio lo inició hace 5 años cuando procedente de Ciénaga en el departamento del Magdalena, donde había  asumió una obligación para iniciarlo, debió trasladarse a la ciudad de Barranquilla y trajo consigo todos los enseres, emprendiendo nuevamente su aventura de negocio. Ella vende refrescos, víveres, ranchos, verduras, enlatados y en general productos de la canasta familiar.  Su meta es lograr ampliarlo y mejorara su bienestar familiar dia a dia. Su mayor desafío es tener el capital de trabajo suficiente, para comprar en mayor cantidad, ranchos, víveres, ganar descuentos y mantener su tienda surtida en una época de gran demanda de estos productos, porque se acercan los carnavales de la ciudad y con ello los gastos de comida y refrescos por parte de sus clientes, lo que potencializa el éxito de su inversión, como ocurre todos los años.
texts.en: Victioria is the owner of a store located in the southwest of the city where she lives with her two daughters who are 15 and 18 years old. She started her business five years ago when she came from Ciénaga in the Magdalena department. She assumed an obligation to start the business. She had to move to the city of Barranquilla and brought all of her belongings. She embarked on her business adventure again. She sells soft drinks, provisions, vegetables, canned goods and other products for the family shopping basket. Her goals are to expand her store and to improve the family’s wellbeing day by day. Her big challenge is having enough working capital to purchase bigger quantities provisions and to earn discounts. Another reason is to maintain a well-stocked store in this period of great demand for these products because city’s carnivals are happening soon. With the carnivals, her customers’ food and drink purchases boost the success of her investment which happens every year.

loans.use: purchase large quantities of provisions.

loans.name: Prosperidad Y Esperanza Group

texts.en:
Rosa is the coordinator of her group Prosperidad y Esperanza, (prosperity and hope). Rosa's group is located in Santiago, an area known for tobacco and beef production. Santiago is the second biggest city in the Dominican Republic. The group members are dedicated to selling cloth, food, shoes and jewelry. Rosa lives in a simple structure with her three children. She is a single mother, dedicated to working hard and providing for her family. She said her most difficult challenge is to help her children to go forward with a good education and a safe living. 

Rosa is excited about her 5th loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for approximately 8 years, starting with her own resources. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by increasing her inventory of beauty products and cosmetics. With this loan, she will be able to expand her business. She will use the profits to save, because she wants to make her dream come true: To have a store and a bigger beauty salon and spa. Rosa thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy hair and beauty products

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy is 29 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has three children ages 10 to 12 years old. All three of them are in school and live at home. For the past three years, she has been involved in making soap. She is requesting a loan to purchase more caustic and oil for her business. She plans to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase  more caustic and oil  for her business

loans.name: Conslata

texts.en: Conslata is 49 years old.  She lives in Migori town and is married to Michael, with whom she has four children aged 5 to 22 years.  She has been operating a brick-selling business for the last two years and makes a monthly income of KES 25,000. She is taking her second loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy more bricks for sale. Her profits will be used to increase her stock of bricks.  Her dream is to grow her business and educate her children.

loans.use: To buy bricks for sale.

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR PASION ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Yucay, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco. 

La socia Ketty; tiene 48 años de edad, la socia es soltera; la socia trabaja en transporte, ella tiene sus buses interprovinciales, la socia también alquila sus buses para prestar servicio turístico, la socia cubre la ruta de Cusco- Urubamba- Ollantaytambo y viceversa; la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de neumáticos para su bus; la socia requiere invertir en la compra de neumáticos para mejorar su unidad vehicular. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de neumáticos. 

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "“SEÑOR PASION ” communal bank, which is located in the Yucay district, in Urubamba province and Cusco department.

The member is Ketty; she is 48 years old and is single.  She works in transportation, she has inter-province buses.  The member also rents out her buses to provided tourism services.  The member covers the Cusco-Urubamba- Ollantaytambo route and vice versa.

The member wants to invest the loan in the purchase of tires for her bus.  She would like to invest in purchasing tires to improve her vehicle.  She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of tires.

The member is grateful for the support which is being granted to her, and similarly she agrees to comply with her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing tires.

loans.name: Aguilas De Corazon Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AGUILAS DE CORAZON” iniciará su decimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Mery. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de celulares, carpintería, venta de comida, comercio de ropa, comercio de zapatos

La señora Mery,  indica que hace diez ciclos que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una vecina. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de celulares que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de sus amistades.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de cabinas telefónicas) que adquirirá de Chile, por mayor, y posteriormente lo venderá en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta área de salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Aguilas de Corazon” (Heart Eagles) will begin its tenth loan cycle with Pro Mujer. As part of the focal point of the Andes, it is made up of eight members, and it is directed by a board headed by Mery. The businesses that the members of the communal bank run are varied between them. There are: cell phone sales, carpentry, food sales, clothing sales, shoe sales. 

Mery says that she has been working with Pro Mujer for ten loan cycles and that she joined the institutions through the invitation of a neighbor. Now she has a cell phone business which she’s been running for years and had learned from friends. 

The loan which she will get is to increase her capital (buy telephone booths) that she will acquire from Chile in bulk and later sell in her sales stall. This form of work allows her to generate income to support her family since she is single and has a son. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answer that she likes the health program.

loans.use: to buy phone booths.

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en: Maureen is 35 years old, a mother of a three year old child, and is married to Joseph, who is a businessman.  She has been operating a fruit-selling business for the last 10 years, earning a monthly income of KES 12,000. She is now taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to increase her stock of mangoes, oranges, bananas and pineapples. She will use her profits to expand her business. Her dream is to expand her fruit-selling business.

loans.use: to increase her stock of mangoes, oranges, bananas and pineapples.

loans.name: Dorcus

texts.en: Dorcus is a 31 year old lady from Kisumu.  She is married to Fredrick and they have one child who is four years old child.  She has been operating a poultry farming business for the last two years, earning a monthly income of KES 14,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy poultry feed. The profits will be used educate her child.  Her dream is to expand her business and become a supplier to hotels.

loans.use: To buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en:
Lydiah has practiced farming in Nyahururu town for the last 12 years.  She is 45 years old, married to William and they have three school-going children. Besides farming,  she owns a green grocery.  

She was introduced to KADET LTD  by one of our field officers and this will be her first loan.She plans to use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In the future, Lydiah hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Nyahururu area.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Assaad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 38 years old, married and has three children, one of whom works.

Assaad has owned a grocery store since 2004, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken and fishes, dairy products. He has  sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan in order to renovate his store. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store.

loans.name: Robai

texts.en:
Robai is a 74-year-old widow from Kakamega County who is taking care of her grandchildren ages 12,18 and eight years old.

Robai operates a dairy farming business and has done this for the last six years, making a monthly income of KES 4,100. She is taking her second loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy dairy feed. Her profits will be used to buy more dairy cows.

Her dream is to educate her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy feed for dairy cows.

loans.name: Helda

texts.en:
Helda is a 32-year-old businessman, who lives in Juba. He is married and has four children between the ages of 12 and 1. Three of his children go to school. 

Helda runs a mixed store business and he has been in the business for four years. He has no employee. Helda heard about Finance Sudan from the loan officer’s word of mouth promotion done in the market and read about it on a signpost. He is taking a loan of 1500 SDG to purchase more items like sweets, Tox (for insects), some pens and many others. Helda has no other source of income. 

In five years, Helda would like to have a big business in his own good building. 

His major challenges include the high cost of living in Juba and food.

Helda says that he is giving thanks for Finance Sudan and for its support, which leads to the economically active but poor being able to uplift themselves from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sweets, Tox (for insects), pens and many other items

loans.name: Phionah's Group

texts.en:
Phionah's group is comprised of three hard working women. Phionah is 18 years old and lives in the town of Kyengera in the Kampala west region of Uganda. For the past year, Phionah has been working hard to manage her poultry farm, which sells chickens. 

To help expand her business, Phionah has requested a loan of 250,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more chickens for resale, and will help Phionah to generate greater profits and pay school fees for herself. Phionah hopes that in the future, she will be able to expand her business. 

Phionah is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training. The ELA program has increased Phionah's future prospects by helping her to improved her business.

loans.use: to buy more chickens for resale.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys es una madre de familia de  42 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos con quines vive además de su esposo en casa propia ubicada en un caserío rural de nombre Totoral Bajo en el Lte 129 del distrito de Tambogrande el mismo que pertenece a la Provincia de Piura. El caserío donde vive en la actualidad solo cuenta con el servicio de luz eléctrica.
 
Gladys se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza de la línea Avon y Cyzone para lo cual realiza dos campañas mensuales teniendo ya sus clientes fijos a quienes ofrece sus diferentes productos, además de genera también otros ingresos criando animales menores los cuales los cría hasta que alcancen el tamaño y peso ideal para venderlos a loas mejores precios en los mercados locales a su caserío. Su esposo cuenta con terreno agrícola de su propiedad en el que actualmente ha sembrado arroz y maíz.

GladYs desea aprovechar las promociones que consisten en la baja de precios de los productos en las líneas que vende, para lo que esta solicitando un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles los que invertirá en hacer posible sus compras.
Mantienen una buena relación familiar ya que junto a su esposo se han propuesto mejorar sus condiciones de vida y buscar mejores propuestas académicas para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gladys, 42, lives with her husband and their 2 children in their own house in the rural village of Totoral Bajo, in the Lte 129, Tambogrande district, in Piura province.  The only basic service in this village is electricity.

Gladys sells Avon and Cyzone beauty products with two sales campaigns every month to her regular customers by offering different items.  She also gets additional income by raising small animals until they are the ideal size to sell at better prices in her village’s local markets.  Her husband has farmland where he currently grows rice and corn.

Gladys would like to take advantage of the promotions offered with the lines that she sells, and for this she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 new sols for her purchases.

She has a closeknit family and with her husband they have planned on improving their standard of living and to look for better schooling for their children.

loans.use: to buy beauty products

loans.name: Abdel Amir

texts.en:
Abdel Amir is from Iraq. He is 62 years old, married and has two children who all work.

Abdel Amir has owned a veterinary clinic since 2000. He has much experience in this field, a deep understanding of all cases and knowledge of an animal’s needs. He has a good reputation and is well known in his neighborhood.

Abdel Amir is requesting a $3000 loan from CHF in order to renovate his clinic and to pay his annual rent for it. He is aiming for more profits so as to provide his family a better life.

loans.use: In order to renovate his clinic and to pay its annual rent.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson is a 35-year-old man from Migori County and is married to Roseline. They have three children between two and eight years old.

Jackson operates a motorcycle transport business, which he has been doing for the last seven years and makes a monthly income of KES 30,000. He is taking his fourth loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy spare parts for the motorcycle and boost his carpentry shop. 

His anticipated profits will be used to repay the loan. His dream is to improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: To buy spare parts

loans.name: Ruffinah

texts.en:
Ruffinah is a 32 year-old lady from Kisumu city and is married to Benson. They have an eight year-old child.

Ruffinah has operated a clothes business for the last five years, making a monthly income of KES.11,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, with which she will buy stock of ladies' tops and skirts. She will use the profits to repay the loan.  Her dream is to buy a piece of land and build a family home.

loans.use: To buy a stock of ladies tops and skirts.

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en:
Mariamu is a 66 year-old lady from Kakamega town, in the west of Kenya.  Mariamu is widowed and has six children between 14 and 27 years old.

Mariamu operates a brick selling business and has been in this business for the last nine years.  She makes a monthly income of KES.5,000. She is taking her second loan, with which she will buy bricks for sale. She will then use the anticipated profits to expand her stock.  Her dream is to expand the business so that she makes enough income to be able to provide for her children.

loans.use: To buy stock of bricks for sale.

loans.name: Jeconiah

texts.en:
Jeconiah, 34, is from Migori County in western Kenya. He is married to Elizabeth, and they have two children.

For the past four years Jeconiah has operated a pool parlor, earning 16,000 KES in monthly income. He is taking a second loan of 50,000 KES from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy two pool tables. His profits will be used to pay his children’s school fees.

Jeconiah’s dream is to educate his children and to diversify into the hotel business.

loans.use: To buy two pool tables.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 47 years old. He is from Migori County, western Kenya and is married to Martha. They have six children between 1 and 12 years old.

John operates a bicycle spare parts shop and has been in this business for the last 10 years. He makes a monthly income of KES 10,000. He is now taking his fourth loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy bicycle spare parts.

His profits will be used to repay the loan as well as provide for his family. His dream is to educate his children.

loans.use: To buy bicycle spare parts

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a 60 year-old man from Homabay County, in the west of Kenya, and is married to Hellen.  They have four children, aged 15 to 22 years.

Fredrick operates a home products business, which he has been running for the last two years.  He makes a monthly income of KES.10,000.  He is taking his first loan from KADET LTD, with which he will buy more home products, like flasks, utensils, jugs, and basins. His profits will be used to repay the loan.  His dream is to be sustainable and also eradicate his level of poverty.

loans.use: To buy more stock of home products, like flasks, utensils, jugs, and basins, for sale.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en:
Pamela is a 43 year-old lady from Homabay County and is married to Omollo, who is a teacher.  They have have four children between 6 and 20 years.

Pamela operates a cereal business. She has been doing this for the last two years and makes a monthly income of KES.13,500.  She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, with which she will  buy more stock of maize, beans, peas and rice cereals. She will use the profits to pay back the loan.  Her dream is to have a better life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of maize, beans, peas and rice cereals.

loans.name: Emilly

texts.en:
Emilly is a 35 year-old woman from Homabay County and is married to Wilson.  They have four children aged 15,13,10 and 2 years. 

Emilly operates a second-hand clothing business and has done this for the last 10 years.  She makes a monthly income of KES.9,200. She is taking her fourth loan from KADET LTD, with which she will buy bales of clothes for sale. Her profits will be used to buy more clothes for sale and also educate her children.  Her dream is to be financially stable.

loans.use: To buy a stock of clothing for sale

loans.name: Micanori

texts.en:
Micanori is a 27-year-old man from Kisumu City.  He is married to Nancy, a businesswoman.  They have a three-year-old child.

Micanori operates a retail business selling mainly watches, sunglasses and wallets and has been doing this for the last four years making a monthly income of KES 10,000. He is taking his first loan from KADET LTD which he will use to buy wallets, sunglasses and belts. 

His profits will be used to repay the loan and increase the business stock. His dream is to have a big business in Kisumu City.

loans.use: To buy wallets, sunglasses and belts for sale.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is a 25-year-old man from Kisumu city.  He is married to Janet and they have a one-year-old child.

Samson operates a clothes-selling business, a business he has been doing for the last three years.  He makes a monthly income of KES 10,000. He is now taking his first loan from KADET LTD which he will use to buy stocks of jeans, T-shirts and ladies' tops. 

His profits will be used to expand the business and also to pay school fees for his wife, who is in college. His dream is to have a big clothing business.

loans.use: To buy jeans, T-shirts and ladies' tops.

loans.name: Bartha

texts.en:
Bartha is a 51 year-old widowed lady from Homabay.  She has four children between 10 and 21 years of age.

Bartha operates a cereal selling business.  She has been doing this for the last 12 years and makes a monthly income of KES.15,000.  She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, with which she will buy more maize and beans for sale.  Bartha will use profits to pay school fees for her children.  Her dream is to educate her children.

loans.use: To buy a stock of maize and bean cereals.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is a 45 year-old lady from Kakamega town and is married to Aziz.  They have two children, 14 and 18 years old.

Florence has operated a tailoring business for the last 14 years, making a monthly income of KES.10,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, with which she will buy fabrics for sale and also for dressmaking in her shop.  Her profits will be used to buy new sewing machines.  Her dream is to own a factory, making traditional African attire.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for sale and also for dressmaking in her shop.

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en:
Kennedy is a 28 year-old man from Kisumu town and is married to Linet. They have two children, aged three and six years.
