With the goal of bolstering their businesses and satisfying their customers further, Bernadette and the other members of the group L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER are requesting a second loan from ALIDé. Their ambition is to increase the level of their business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and corn.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel nació en la comunidad de Amaru de la ciudad Pisaq (Perú) y tiene 73 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, él tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio y también tiene una pequeña carpintería en su domicilio donde elabora todo tipo de muebles de madera como por ejemplo mesas, sillas, puertas, etc. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la carpintería y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 
Miguel requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como cola de carpintero, clavos, madera y otras cosas. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Miguel was born in Amaru community, in the city of Pisaq (Peru).  He is 73 years old and lives with his common-law wife.  The couple have two children.  Miguel currently lives in the city of Pisaq and this is where he carries out his business activities.  He has a small grocery store in his home and also has a small carpentry workshop where he makes all kinds of wooden furniture such as tables, chairs, doors, etc.  He  has been in the carpentry trade for several years and it is doing very well thanks to the effort that he puts into his work.

Miguel needs this loan to buy work materials such as carpenter's glue, nails, wood, etc.

The members of the 'Mosoq Ñusta' community bank meet once a month in Pisaq district, in Calca province (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and for being home to one of the seven wonders of the world: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as carpenter's glue, nails, wood, etc.

loans.name: Afia

texts.fr:
Afia est une femme âgé(e) de 24 ans. Elle est mariée å un  magasinier. Elle a 04 enfants. 
Afia travaille comme revendeuse de sacs de charbons de bois de tubercules et de miels depuis 2008. Elle vend à domicile à ses clients et s’approvisionne à Notsé (une localité située à quelques kilomètres de la ville de Lomé. Une personne l’aide dans l’exercice de son activité.
Afia a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des ignames et des bidons de miels. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Afia voudrait assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Afia is a 24-year-old woman. She is married to a shopkeeper and has four children. Afia has been working as retailer of sacks of charcoal, tubers, and honey since 2008. She sells out of her home to her customers, and she gets her supplies in Notsé (a town located a few kilometers from the city of Lomé). One person helps her in operating her business. 

Afia has requested her first loan from WAGES to buy some yams and containers of honey. She wants to reinvest in her business. Over the next few years, Afia would like to ensure that her family’s vital needs are met.

loans.use: to buy yams and honey

loans.name: Vazha

texts.en:
Vazha is 59 years old.  He lives in a small village in the Kakheti Region with his wife, Tina, two sons aged 14 and 12 years and his mother, who is retired.  Vazha is a car artisan.  He has a small workshop and provides car repair services to the local population.  In addition to his main job, he is actively involved in the family agricultural business.  They have a milk cow and a pig.  Tina produces cheese and sells it at the local market. The family’s total average monthly income is 350 laris. 

Vazha has requested a loan to expand the pig farm.  He plans to purchase piglets and raise them.  After five or six months, Vazha will begin selling the piglets.  The sale of the piglets will provide the family with additional income, which will be used for improving their living conditions and financing the children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to expand his pig farm.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is from Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is thirty years old. Carmelita is married and has two children. 

To make a living, Carmelita runs a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community. Carmelita has been in her business for six years and earns 6,870 PHP a month for these activities.

Carmelita is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. In 2009, Carmelita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a married woman with two dependents. Lilia is forty-five years old, and resides in Clarin, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. Lilia owns and operates a retail business to earn a living and she's been doing this for two years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP from the business. 

She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell. In 2006, Lilia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Lilia wants to build house and to help her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is a married woman who has two children. Elvira is forty-five years old, and resides at Catadman, Ozamis City: Philippines. Elvira raises pigs for sale to earn a living and she's been in this business for two years. Each month, she earns 2,500 PHP doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 4,150 PHP to purchase livestock feed and other supplies. In 2010, Elvira joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Elvira wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and other supplies.

loans.name: German

texts.en:
German is single, fifty-two years old and lives in the Philippines.

German operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for four years and every month he earn 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP to repair his existing vehicle so it can give better service.

German has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2010. In the future, German hopes to gain double the income from his business.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle so it can give better service.

loans.name: Aliboy

texts.ru: Алибой- один из успешных клиентов организации, который кредитуется с 2006 года. Женат имеет троих детей. В самом начале своей кредитной истории он получал сумму кредита 300 сомони, на которую он покупал один мешок риса и постепенно увеличил свой товарооборот до 7000 сомони. Он покупает рис у дехкан, которые привозят ему по оптовой цене, несколько мешков риса, которые он продаёт в течении двух недель и опять покупает новый товар. В данный момент у него около 800 кг риса, который пользуется большим спросом у населения, ведь таджикский народ любитель национального плова.
texts.en: Aliboy is one of the most successful clients of our organization and has been working with us since 2006.  He is married and has three children.  At the onset of his credit history, he obtained a loan in the amount of 300 somoni, which he used to buy one bag of rice and gradually increased his product turnover to 7000 somoni.  He buys rice from dekhan farmers, who deliver several bags of rice to him at a wholesale price.  He sells the rice during the course of two weeks and then buys new product again.  Currently, Aliboy has about 800 kilograms of rice, which is in high demand among the residents because the Tajik people love the national plov dish.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory of rice

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнаре 45 лет, замужем, имеет двоих детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, Гульнара начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммой 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гульнары, на сегодня в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 головы дойных коров и 20 голов овец, 1,6га орошаемой земли, где она выращивает фасоль и картофель, а также 1 га арендованной земли с многолетними травами.  Для дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Гульнара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух дойных коров и десяти овцематок. Доходы Гульнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Gulnara is 45 years old, married and has two children.  In search of a financial source for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry and farming with an initial sum of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistent work, Gulnara's business currently has two heads of dairy cows and twenty sheep, and 1.6 hectares of irrigated land, where she grows beans and potatoes, and also 1 hectare of leased land with multi-year herbs.  In order to further expand her business, Gulnara requested a loan in the sum of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy two dairy cows and ten ewes.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Hayridin

texts.ru: Хайридин просит кредит для приобретения необходимых запчастей и ремонта автомобиля.
texts.en: Hayridin is requesting this loan to purchase necessary spare parts and repair his vehicle.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: Luciana

texts.es:
Luciana nació en la ciudad de Taray de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 50 años de edad, ella está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a  vender gelatinas y tortas de forma ambulatoria subiendo a los buses que se dirigen a la ciudades de Cusco y Calca y tambien tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes.  
Luciana requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo harina, leche, huevo, mantequilla, naranjas, vainilla y otras cosas más que se necesitan para preparar más tortas. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Luciana was born in the city of Taray in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru), and is 50 years old.  She is married, and has six children from this relationship. She currently lives in the city of Pisaq, which is also where she works. She works selling jellies and cakes as a street vendor, going up to the buses that head to the cities of Cusco and Calca.  She also has a small grocery store.

Luciana is requesting the loan to purchase supplies; for example flour, milk, eggs, butter, oranges, vanilla and other additional items that she needs for making more cakes.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase supplies; for example flour, milk, eggs, butter, oranges, vanilla and other additional items

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is twenty-nine years old, and married with three children. Meriam has been engaged in gardening and corn production for ten years and earns 12,000 PHP monthly. 

In 2008, she become a part of GDMPC. Now, she's taking a loan of 23,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She is positive and hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Lando

texts.en:
Lando is from Segatic Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is thirty-nine years old. Lando is married and has six children. To make a living, Lando raises crops, mainly bananas. Lando has been in his business for six years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month from it. 

In 2008, Lando joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lando is requesting a new loan of 8,770 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is a forty-nine-year-old married mom of two children. She is living in Segatic Daku, Misamis Occidental Philippines, where her wide array of corn production is located. She normally receives PHP 3,000 a month. 

In 2010, Analiza joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase fertilizers such as manure to increase production. When the crop gets sold, the revenue from it will be allotted to expanding the business area to earn more income and to sustain her daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Los Portales Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Los Portales” es un banco comunal que pertenece a la Asociación Arariwa y está conformado por 6 mujeres y 3 varones. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días y todas las socias tienen que estar presentes en las reuniones programadas sino pagan una multa. La mayoría de los socios son vecinos y tienen una buena amistad y viven en el distrito de Paruro de la provincia de Paruro del departamento  del Cusco. Nuestros socios son gente muy trabajadora y muy ingeniosa, ellos se dedican principalmente a la ganadería y agricultura, ellos cuentan con bastos terrenos y venden lo que sus tierras producen, según las fechas de siembra y cosecha, ellos cuando no están en sus tierras se dedican al comercio, comprando y almacenando víveres para su futura venta. Los socios solicitan el préstamo para así seguir reinvirtiendo en sus diferentes actividades. Nuestros socios agradecen y valoran el préstamo otorgado ya que en la ciudad de Paruro ellos solo tienen este apoyo financiero.

La socia Delia tiene 35 años y vive en la ciudad de Paruro. Delia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que trabaja en una entidad financiera del estado en la ciudad de Paruro y trabaja en el área de servicio de limpieza, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, chanchos y gallinas. En esta oportunidad la socia Delia requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes.
texts.en:
“Los Portales” Communal Bank is part of the “Asociación Arariwa” and is comprised of six women and three men.  The Communal Bank meets every thirty days and all members must be present at the scheduled meetings or pay a fine.  Most of the members are neighbors as well as good friends.  They live in the Paruro district, province of Paruro province, Cusco department.  Our members are very ingenious and hard-working.  They are mainly engaged in cattle-raising and farming.  They have rough terrain and sell the crops the land produces, according to the sowing and harvesting seasons.  When they are not working on their land, they are engaged in trade, buying and storing provisions for future sale.  The members are requesting the loan to continue re-investing in their various businesses.  Our members appreciate and value the loans offered as this is the only source of financial support available in Paruro.  
Delia is 35 years old and lives in the city of Paruro.  She is an enterprising and hard-working woman who provides cleaning services to a state financial institution in Paruro.  She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens, and pigs.  At this time, she is requesting the loan to purchase more small animals such as guinea pigs.

loans.use: to purchase small animals such as guinea pigs.

loans.name: Biviana

texts.es:
Biviana nació en la comunidad de Amaru de la ciudad de Pisaq (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 42 años de edad, ella es viuda y tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde  nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella tiene una pequeña tienda escolar en unos de los colegios de la comunidad de Cuyo Chico, ella también se dedica  a la proveer materiales para la elaboración de artesanía como por ejemplo ocarinas y pitos de agua, ella despacha 2000 unidades a la ciudad de Lima y cada unidad lo vende a S/. 1. 20 nuevos soles. Ya son ocho años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 
Biviana requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo arcilla. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Biviana was born in the community of Amaru in the city of Pisaq (Cusco, Peru) and is 42 years old.  She is a widow and has three children.  Currently she lives in the same city where she was born and where she works.

She has a small school store in some of the schools in the community of Cuyo Chico.  She also works supplying materials to make handicrafts such as ocarinas and water whistles.  She sends 2000 units to the city of Lima and sells each unit for 1.2 PEN.  She has had this business for eight years now and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her job.

Biviana needs the loan to buy materials such as clay, for example.

The members of Mosoq Ñusta Communal Bank meet every month in the district of Pisaq in the province of Calca (Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is known for its tourism, its commerce, its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world is there, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy materials such as clay.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas tiene 55 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en el departamento de Apurímac provincia de Andahuaylas pero vive en la ciudad de Pisaq de la provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Felicitas y su esposo tiene un taller donde elaboran cosas de metal mecánico, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar fierros, soldaduras y muchas cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le ha va muy bien. 

Felicitas pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Felicitas is 55 years old. She is married, and has four children from this relationship. She was born in the department of Apurímac in Andahuaylas province, but she lives in the city of Pisaq in Calca province in the department of Cusco in Peru.  

Felicitas and her husband have a workshop where they make things from metal.  On this occasion, she is requesting the loan to purchase iron, solder, and many other things. She has been working in this business for several years, and it has been going very well for her.

Felicitas belongs to the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa.  She is grateful for the opportunity being given to her by this means, and agrees to comply with making her repayments according to the schedule.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase iron, solder and many other items.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga tiene 33 años de edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella vive en la distrito de Pisaq provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Dominga se dedica a la venta de ropa y artesanía en uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad de Pisaq,  ella requiere el préstamo para incrementar el capital del negocio y desea comprar artesanía como mantas, chullos, guantes, ponchos y otras cosas más. Dominga pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Dominga is 33 years old. She is in a common-law marriage, from which she has two children.  She lives in the district of Pisaq in Calca province, in the department of Cusco in Peru.

Dominga works selling clothing and handicrafts in one the most popular markets in the city of Pisaq.  She is requesting the loan to increase her business' capital, and she wants to purchase handicrafts such as blankets, knit hats, gloves, ponchos and other additional items.

Dominga belongs to the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa. She is grateful for the opportunity being given to her by this means, and agrees to comply with making her repayments according to the schedule.

The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank meet monthly in the district of Pisaq in Calca province (in Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase handicrafts such as blankets, knit hats, gloves, ponchos and other additional items

loans.name: Amin Lolo

texts.fr:
Amin est une femme âgé(e) de 30 ans. Elle est mariée å un employé au port. Elle a 02 enfants. Amin travaille comme revendeuse de bijoux  depuis 2009. Elle vend de façon ambulante aux clients et achète à Cotonou( Bénin). 
Amin a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bijoux de bonne qualité. Elle voudrait avoir plus de bénéfice pour louer une boutique et voir sa famille s'épanouir.
texts.en:
Amin is a 30-year-old woman who is married to a harbor employee and has two children. She has been a jewelry reseller since 2009. She buys her merchandise in Cotonou (Benin) and conducts her sales door-to-door.

Amin is seeking her first loan from WAGES to buy high-quality jewelry. She would like to increase her profits to rent a shop and ensure her family’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Issifou

texts.fr:
Issifou est un homme âgé de 29 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a un enfant.
Issifou travaille comme revendeur depuis 2006. Il vend des pneus, des jantes et des écrous pour tous clients à Akodessewa. Il achète les produits au port autonome de Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir pas satisfaire toutes les demandes.
Issifou a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pneus, des jantes et des écrous. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Issifou voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille.
texts.en: Issifou is a 29-year-old man.  He is married to a retailer and has one child.  He has been working as a retailer since 2006.  He sells tires, rims, and nuts to customers in Akodessewa.  He buys his products in the autonomous port of Lomé, and works alone.  At the moment, Issifou's main difficulty is in meeting all the demand.  Issifou requested his first loan through WAGES in order to buy tires, rims, and nuts.  He wants to reinvest in his business.  In the next few years, Issifou would like to expand his business.  He says that with the profits he plans to ensure a bright future for his family.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba de la provincia de La Convención (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 60 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, él se dedica a la elaboración de cerámica y tiene su taller en su domicilio, él pertenece a una Asociación de artesanos de la ciudad de Pisaq. Ya son diez años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Santiago requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo cofres, keros, salamancas, saleros y otras cosas más.     

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Santiago was born in the town of Quillabamba in the province of Convención (Cusco, Peru). He is 60 years old and has a partner with whom he has three children. Currently he lives and works in the town of Pisaq. He makes pottery and has a workshop in his home.  He belongs to the Artisans’ Association in Pisaq and has been a potter for ten years. His business is doing well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.

Santiago needs a loan to buy materials such as boxes, moulds, and saltcellars. 

The members of the Mosoq Ñusta Community Bank meet every month in Pisaq, in Calca province (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is famous for its tourism and businesses as well as the traditional festival of Inti Raymi. It is also the location of one of the Wonders of the World, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to buy materials such as boxes, moulds, and saltcellars

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Leónidas Proaño se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 42 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos de 22, 17, 14, 12 y 10 años de edad los mismos que estudian en Universidad, colegio y escuela. El marido es comerciante.
 
Ella junto a su esposo tienen un negocio de venta de cueritos y carne asada, para lo cual instalan un pequeño local en el centro de la ciudad por donde hay muchas personas que transitan por el lugar por lo cual sus ventas siempre son muy buenas, trabajan todos los días desde las 13h00 hasta las 18h00,  son 17 años que llevan realizando esta actividad la cual les ha servido para sacar adelante a sus hijos y a su familia.
 
Este crédito es para comprar carne, carbón, cueritos y otros víveres necesarios para preparar sus platos. Lleva 5 ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le han ayudado mucho para su negocio.

Su sueño es tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Leónidas Proaño" meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of the same name in the city of Manta. This city is known for its beautiful beaches that are frequented throughout the year. It is also a city of unequaled beauty that has many tourist attractions.

It is in this place where Sra. María lives. She is 42 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has five children (ages 22, 17, 14, 12, and 10) who attend the university, high school, or elementary school. Her husband is a merchant.

María and her husband have a business selling pork rinds and roasted meats from a small shop in the central part of the city. There are many people who pass through this place, so their sales have always been good. They work every day from 1pm to 6pm. María has been in this business for 17 years and it has helped to move her children and her family forward.

This loan will be used to buy meat, charcoal, pork rinds, and other necessary ingredients for preparing her dishes. She has been with her Communal Bank for five loan cycles and enjoys being a member because the loans have been a great help to her business. Her goal is to have a successful shop.

loans.use: to buy meat, charcoal, pork rinds, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto nació en la ciudad de Pisaq y tiene 51 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, él y su esposa Dina tiene un pequeño restaurante en su domicilio, ellos preparan menú para el medio día de lunes a sábados pero los domingos de vez en cuando preparan comidas típicas de la región como por ejemplo chicharon, adobo y otros más. 

Alberto requiere el préstamo el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, verduras, carne, menestras y otras cosas más. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Alberto was born in the city of Pisaq, and is 51 years old. He has a common-law relationship, from which he has two children. Currently, he lives in the city where he was born, where he has his livelihood. He and his wife Dina have a small restaurant in their home. 

They prepare a daily mid-day meal from Monday to Saturday, but on Sundays they sometimes prepare traditional meals of the region, such as chicharon (fried pork), adobo (marinated pork in sauce), and others. 

Alberto needs the loan to buy ingredients such as sacks of rice and sugar, vegetables, meat, legumes, and other things. 

The members of the "Mosoq Ñusta" communal bank meet every month in Pisaq district, in Calca province (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a very important tourist and commercial area; for its traditional Inti Raymi festival; and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located there.

loans.use: To buy

loans.name: Gloria Piedad

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer de 51 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona de caracter fuerte per muy responsable en su trabajo para sacar adelante a su hija. Vive con su hija en la ciudad de Ambato en la provincia de Tungurahua.

Gloria trabaja en su casa en la confección de blusas, es el primer crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de tela e hilo para incrementar su negocio, necesita confeccionar más blusas,camisas, bolsos ya que tiene muy buena clientela y quiere servirles de la mejor manera, de esta manera podrá obtener muy buenos ingresos y ayudará a seguirle dando el estudio a su hija.

Gloria sueña tener un taller grande para poder emplear a personal y que sus productos sean de exportación.
texts.en:
Gloria is 51 years old and is well-known for her strength of character, commitment to her work, and for helping her daughter to get ahead. She and her daughter live in the town of Ambato, in the province of Tungurahua.

Gloria works from home making blouses. This is the first loan she has sought from Fodemi, and she plans to use the money to buy fabric and thread so she can expand her business. She wants to make blouses, shirts, and bags as she has very good customers and wishes to serve them even better. In this way she will earn a good living and will be able to continue supporting her daughter through school.

Her dream is to have a large workshop and employ people to help her make goods for export.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es chofer propietario de un minibús; trabaja dentro de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para la reparación y mantenimiento de su vehiculo ya que es la única fuente de trabajo que tiene para mantener a su familia.
Juan es casado, tiene tres hijos y vive con su esposa en la zona de Tembladerani ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMRO y la primera vez que trabaja con KIVA.
texts.en:
Juan is an independent driver of a minibus. He works within the city of La Paz. The loan he is requesting will be used to repair and maintain his vehicle since it is the only source of income by which he is able to support his family. Juan is married, has three children, and lives with his wife in the District of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz.

This is the first time he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for repairs and maintenance of his minibus.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 22 años de edad, tiene un hijo pero ahora está embarazada y está en el noveno mes de gestación, ella vive en la distrito de Coya provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Sandra se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y también a la venta de artesanía, ella requiere el préstamo para incrementar el capital del negocio y desea comprar artesanía como collares, pulseras y otras cosas más. Sandra pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
She lives in the district of Coya, province of Calca, department of Cusco, Perú.  Sandra raises small animals such as guinea pigs and also sells artisan crafts.  She is requesting the loan to increase her working capital and wishes to purchase artisan crafts such as necklaces, bracelets, and other items.  Sandra belongs to the “Mosoq Ñusta” Communal Bank, which is part of the “Asociación Arariwa”.  She is grateful for the opportunity provided by this means, and is committed to making her payments as scheduled.  
The members of the “Mosoq Ñusta” Communal Bank meet every thirty days in the district of Pisaq, province of Calca (Cusco Perú).  Cusco is known as a popular tourist and commercial area.  It is also famous for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it is the home of Machu Pichu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to purchase necklaces, bracelets, and other items.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is married and has three children. She is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. Vivian owns and operates a business providing manicures in the local community. She cuts, cleans, and polishes nails to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. Every month she earn 3,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 7,400 PHP to purchase materials for the manicure shop.

In 2009 Vivian became a member of GDMPC. In the future, Vivian hopes to see her children finish their education.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her manicure shop

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
As a married mother of 7 children, Yolanda works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from hog raising. Yolanda is borrowing 17,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more fish and other seafood to sell to customers.

Yolanda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to build a general store.

loans.use: to buy more fish and other seafood to sell to customers.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 35 years old, is married, and has three children. With all her children in school, Rosalie works very hard to provide for them.

Rosalie runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock of groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

Rosalie has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, detergents, and other groceries. 

In the future, Rosalie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy stock of groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Viviana Mariuxi

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal 7 De Septiembre se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Viviana, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 14, 7 y 6 años de edad, el mayor estudian en colegio y  los menores en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en un hotel de la ciudad.

Ella es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo yproductos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Ella sale a recorrer tres días de la semana de dos a tres horas diarias, pero también vende en su casa donde tiene unas vitrinas y hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando quieren un producto o alguna prenda, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, ella recibe su mercadería desde los Estados Unidos ya que allá hay alguien que le envía cada vez que ella necesita Tiene más de 12 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, entre otras cosas. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer.

Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The September 7th Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the city of Manta. This city is known for its beautiful beaches that are frequented throughout the year. It is also a city of unequaled beauty that has many tourist attractions.

It is in this place where one can meet Sra. Viviana. She is 37 years old, married, and has three children (ages 14, 7, and 6). The oldest child is in high school and the two younger ones are in elementary school. Her husband works at a hotel in the city.

Viviana is a homemaker who earns her own income so that she can help her husband with the household expenses. She sells clothing of all types as well as Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories). Viviana sells by traveling three days a week for two to three hours, but she also sells from her home where she has a few display cabinets. Her customers come to her home whenever they need a product or an article of clothing. Viviana extends credit for her products and collects payment every eight days. She receives her merchandise from the United States and the products are shipped to her as needed. Vivana has been in this business for more than 12 years and has done very well.

This loan will be used to buy clothing, perfumes, crèmes, cosmetics, and other items. She has been with the Communal Bank from the very beginning and enjoys being a member because the payments are easy to make. Her dream is to own a boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothing, perfumes, crèmes, cosmetics, and other items.

loans.name: Teodocia

texts.es:
Teodocia nació en la ciudad de Taray de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 50  años de edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a  la venta de comida tiene un pequeño restaurante. Ya son 11 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 
Teodocia requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más que necesita para seguir preparando rica comida. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Teodocia was born in the city of Taray, in the province of Calca (Cusco, Perú).  She is 50 years old.  She has a common-law union from which she has three children.  She currently lives in the city of Pisaq, where she does her work.  She sells food, and she has a small restaurant.  She has been working at this business for 11 years, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.
Teodocia is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, and other things that she needs to continue preparing tasty food.
The members of the Communal Bank "Mosoq Ñusta" get together once a month in the Pisaq district in the Calca province (Cusco, Perú).  Cuscois known for being a tourist and commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional "Inti Raymi" festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world, "Machupicchu", is located near by.

loans.use: buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sugar, and other things that she needs to continue preparing tasty food.

loans.name: Bamah

texts.fr:
Bamah est une femme âgé(e) de 36 ans. Elle est mariée å un/footballeur.  Elle a 01 enfant âgé de 10ans qui va à l’école.
Bamah travaille comme revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale depuis 2008. Elle vend à domicile à toutes personnes et achète les produits à Lomé. Sa difficulté est la mévente. 
Bamah a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentations générale.  Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Bamah voudrait avoir une boutique. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit s’occuper de l’avenir de son enfant.
texts.en:
Bamah is 36 years old. She is married to a football player and the couple have a 10-year-old child who goes to school. 

Bamah has been selling general food products since 2008. She buys her merchandise in Lomé and works from her home, selling to anyone. Drops in sales are her main difficulty.

Bamah is seeking her first loan from WAGES to stock up on general food products. She plans to reinvest in her activity. In the long term, she would like to have her own shop. She will use her profits to provide for her child’s future.

loans.use: to buy general food products for resale.

loans.name: Divine Misericode Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DIVINE MISERICODE est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier et appartiennent à un même groupe de tontine. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Sogbandji Catherine, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Sogbandji Catherine, est âgée de 55 ans. Sogbandji Catherine ne vit plus avec son mari et est mère de trois enfants tous scolarisés dont un reste à sa charge. Sogbandji Catherine vit seule avec son enfant et assure seule les diverses charges de la famille. Sogbandji Catherine a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Pour assurer ses divers besoins et ceux de son enfant, Sogbandji Catherine vend de la farine blé, du sucre et de l’huile végétale. Parallèlement à cette activité, Sogbandji Catherine vend des savons liquides. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire, Sogbandji Catherine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DIVINE MISERICODE, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le crédit reçu antérieurement a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The DIVINE MISERICODE group is made up of three persons who live in the same neighborhood and belong to the same "tontine" (community savings and loan association). The representative of this group, Sogbandji Catherine, is the one who has her hand raised in the photo. She is 55 and she no longer lives with her husband. She is the mother of three children, all having attended school, of whom one is still in her care.  Sogbandji Catherine lives alone with her child and is responsible for supporting her little family. 

Sogbandji Catherine left school at the primary level. In order to support herself and her child, she sells wheat flour, sugar, and vegetable oil. Besides this activity, she also sells liquid soap. Wishing to satisfy her clientele and grow her sales, she is requesting, together with the other members of her group, DIVINE MISERICODE, a second loan from ALIDé. Her prior loan has been correctly reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy sacks of wheat flour and sugar and tins of vegetable oil.

loans.name: Ruth Mery

texts.es: La Sra. Ruth se dedica  al venta de ropa de segunda mano tiene 45 años y es casada con 2 hijos que son 3 años y 8 años, ella se dedica a la venta  de  ropa  de segunda mano hace mas de 5 años, su negocio se encuentra en la zona del plan 3000,  la Sra. se encuentra en su quinta secuencia con la institución, Ruth usara este préstamo de  para para el inicio de su nuevo negocio que es la compra de un carrito hamburguesito para la venta de hamburguesas por las noches,  La Sra. Ruth enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la demanda de mucha competencia y el cambio climático. Ella esta muy contenta de empezar este empezar este nuevo negocio, ya que incrementara sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida, La Sra. Ruth es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Ruth sells secondhand clothing. She is 45 years old, married, and has two children (ages 3 and 8). Ruth has been selling secondhand clothing for more than five years. Her business is located in the Plan 3000 District. She is in her fifth loan cycle with Emprender and will use this loan to start a new business. She will buy a hamburger cart so that she can sell hamburgers at night. Sra. Ruth faces challenges in her business because of the high level of competition and the changing marketplace. She is very happy to be starting a new business so that she can increase her income and improve her quality of life.

Sra. Ruth is hardworking individual and is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy a hamburger cart.

loans.name: Ubaldo

texts.es:
Ubaldo nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 55 años de edad, él está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Pisaq y donde realiza sus actividades, él es albañil y realiza todo tipo de obras como por ejemplo revestimiento de casas, pavimentación de calles y otras cosas más, él y su esposa tiene un negocio familiar  consiste en vender productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, y muchas cosas más, él se dedica a brindar servicio de mototaxi en la ciudad de Pisaq y a vender repuestos de mototaxi. 

Ubaldo requiere el préstamo para comprar repuestos como frenos, aceites, embriagues, llantas y otras cosas más. 

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Ubaldo was born in the city of Paucartambo (Cusco, Peru). He is 55 years old, married and has six children from this union. Currently he lives and works in the city of Pisaq. He is a bricklayer and performs all types of work, for instance floor covering, street paving, and other tasks. He and his wife have a family business where they sell staple goods, such as rice, sugar, noodles and much more. Ubaldo offers motor taxi services in the city of Pisaq and sells spare parts for motor taxis.

Ubaldo applies for this loan to buy spare parts, such as brakes, oil, clutches, tires and other things.

The members of the communal bank "Mosoq Ñusta" meet at the end of each month in the district of Pisaq in the province of Calca (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a popular tourist resort as well as for its commercial activities and its traditional Inti Raymi festival. One of the Seven Wonders of the World, the Machu Picchu, is nearby.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motor taxi business.

loans.name: Mariana Deje

texts.es:
Mariana es una mujer de 60 años, se caracteriza por ser una mujer tranquila, muy trabajadora y responsable en sus actividades. Mariana es soltera, no tiene hijos, vive sola en un sector de la ciudad de Ambato en la provincia de Tungurahua.

Mariana trabaja sola en la crianza de cerdos, es el primer crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de crías de cerdos blancos para criarlos y engordarles debido a que acostumbra a sacar a sus animales a la venta en las ferias, este proceso permitirá a Mariana obtener buenos ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.

El sueño de Mariana es poder tener un trabajo estable y poder dar empleo a personas que lo necesiten.
texts.en:
Mariana is 60 years old.  She is characterized as being quiet, hard-working, and responsible in her activities.  She is unmarried and doesn’t have any children.  She lives alone in a sector of the city of Ambato, in the province of Tungurahua.
Mariana works alone, raising pigs.  This is the first loan she is requesting from Fodemi.  She is planning to invest the funds in the purchase of white baby pigs to raise and fatten. She usually takes her animals to the market to sell.  This process allows Mariana to earn good income and improve her quality of life. Mariana’s dream is to be able to have a stable job and employ other people who need work.  
.

loans.use: to purchase white, baby pigs to raise and fatten.

loans.name: Adonai Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ADONAI” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Valeria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de accesorios de celulares, tienda de barrio, tejido de chompas, taller de costura, contratista de construcción, venta de leche.

La señora Valeria  indica que este es el segundo ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de celulares que viene trabajando hace años atrás.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de celulares) que comprará de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la atención y el ahorro.
texts.en:
The "Adonai" communal bank will start its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Center. It is composed of seven members, and it is directed by a board headed by Valeria. The members of the communal bank have various businesses. Among them we have: cell phone accessory sales, neighborhood store, knitting sweaters, dressmaking workshop, construction contractor, and selling milk.

Valeria indicates that this is the second cycle she has worked with Pro Mujer, joining by invitation from a representative. Currently, she has a business selling cell phones. She has been doing this work for years.

The loan that she will now receive is to increase her capital (purchase of cell phones), which she will buy in the city of El Alto and later sell at her stand. This form of work allows her to generate resources in order to support her family as much as possible, since she is married and has a son. 

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the attention and the savings.

loans.use: to purchase cell phones

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de ropa, la cocia tambien continua tejiendo chompas y pantalones para niños y niñas de lanas y lo vende en forma ambulatoria; continua vendeindo en las ferias. la socia quiere amplio su negocio. La socia ahora solicita el préstamo para comprar lana de colores para tejer las chompas y pantalones.
texts.en: The bank member is still working in her business of buying and selling clothes. She also continues to weave children's sweaters and pants from wool, and sells them by going house to house. She also still sells in the markets. She would like to increase her business. She is requesting a loan to buy colored wool to weave to make into sweaters and pants.

loans.use: to buy colored wool to weave sweaters and pants

loans.name: Minandjangodo Group

texts.fr: MINANDJANGODO est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Assiba Véronique (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 51 ans. Assiba Véronique est mariée à un cultivateur du nom de Martin. Le couple a quatre enfants dont certains scolarisés, et deux restent à leur charge. Assiba Véronique vit ensemble avec son mari et ses deux enfants à charge. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Assiba Véronique n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Assiba Véronique vend depuis une vingtaine d’années, des sacs de charbons de bois par le système de distribution. Assiba Véronique s’approvisionne dans un village du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux satisfaire les exigences de sa clientèle, Assiba Véronique sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MINANDJANGODO un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
MINANDJANGODO is a group of three persons all living in the same neighborhood. The group representative, Assiba Véronique, who is raising her hand in the photo, is 51 years old. She is married to a farmer named Martin and the couple have four children of whom some have been enrolled in school and of whom two are still in their care. 

Assiba Véronique lives together with her husband and her two minor children. The couple share in supporting the household. Assiba Véronique did not attend school. In order to make a living for herself, she has been selling, for around 20 years, sacks of charcoal by the distribution system. She buys her wares in a village in Bénin. In order to bolster her business and better satisfy her customers, Assiba Véronique is requesting, together with the other members of the group called MINANDJANGODO, a first-ever loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Carmen Lourdes

texts.es: Carmen Lourdes, continua con su negocio de la artesania, ella continua pintando sus trabajos con pinceles y oxidos naturales, la socia en esta ocasion desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de mercaderia como arcilla para elaborar las diferentes piezas de arte decorativo y de utilidad, la socia comprara brochas y pinceles de todo grozor y finura, ella tambien invertira en la compra de oxidos naturales para pintar.
texts.en: Carmen Lourdes continues her crafts business. She continues painting her works with brushes and natural oxides. At this time, this (communal bank) member wants to invest her loan in the purchase of merchandise such as clay to make her various pieces of art, both decorative and utilitarian. She will buy various brushes of all thicknesses and fineness. She will also invest in the purchase of natural oxides for painting.

loans.use: to buy clay for making various pieces of art, both decorative and utilitarian, brushes of all sizes, and natural oxides for painting.

loans.name: Amen Group

texts.fr: AMEN est un groupe composé de deux personnes, et dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Georgette (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 48 ans. Georgette est mariée à un certain Marcellin. Le couple a six enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Georgette vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Georgette a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Georgette vend depuis plus de vingt cinq ans, des fruits et des bijoux dans son quartier. Georgette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but d’agrandir son activité pour être plus compétitive sur le marché, Georgette sollicite ensemble avec le second membre du groupe AMEN, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
AMEN is a group composed of two persons who live in the same neighborhood. The group representative, Georgette (who is raising her hand in the photo), is 48 years old. She is married to Marcellin. The couple have six children, all enrolled in school and all still in their care. Georgette lives together with her husband and children. The couple share in supporting the household. 

Georgette stopped attending school at the secondary level. In order to support herself, she has been selling fruit and costume jewelry in her neighborhood for 25 years. She buys her wares in a market in Bénin. Wishing to grow her business so as to be more competitive in the marketplace, Georgette is requesting, together with the other member of the group called AMEN, a third loan from ALIDé. The first two loans have been correctly reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy fruit and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio y su salón de bellezaella continua comprando productos y accesorios para implementar el salon de belleza, ella amplio y mejoro su negocio y ahora desea invertir en la compra de cepillos, tintes finos, colorantes, decolorantes, bigudies entre otros.
texts.en: The member continues her beauty salon business.  She continues buying products and accessories to implement her beauty salon.  She has grown and improved her business, and now she wishes to invest in the purchase of brushes, fine dyes, coloring, bleaches, curlers, and other supplies.

loans.use: to purchase beauty supplies.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel está aplicando a su segundo credikiva con el que planea comprar materias primas e insumos para la preparación de sus comidas y también comprará herramientas y reparará otras más, para ir mejorando su infraestructura. Con su anterior credikiva compró un triciclo e insumos en un mayor volumen y esto le ha servido mucho,  porque está mas organizado, obtuvo descuentos, aumentó su clientela etc. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “ Agradecido con las personas que me apoyaron con recursos para el crédito anterior, ya que pude llevar a cabo las inversiones planeadas que necesitaba para el negocio. “
texts.en: Miguel is applying for his second Kiva loan, with which he plans to buy basic materials and ingredients to prepare his foods, and he will also buy tools and repair others, to continue improving his infrastructure. With his previous Kiva loan, he bought a tricycle and ingredients in large volume, and these have served him well, because he is more organized, he obtained discounts, he increased his clientele, etc. His message to the Kiva lenders is the following: I am thankful to the people who supported me with resources through the previous loan, since I was able to complete the planned investments that I needed for the business.

loans.use: to buy basic materials and ingredients to prepare his foods and also to buy tools and repair others.

loans.name: Jlomahuton Group

texts.fr: JLOMAHUTON est un groupe de quatre personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Benin. La représentante du groupe du nom de Pascaline Akoua (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 40 ans.  Pascaline Akoua est mariée à un certain Etienne. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pascaline Akoua vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Pascaline Akoua n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Pascaline Akoua vend depuis huit ans, des plastiques, des savons, des tissus et de l’huile végétale par le système de distribution. Pascaline Akoua s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses, Pascaline Akoua sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JLOMAHUTON un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
JLOMAHUTON is a group of four persons, all residing in the same neighborhood in Benin. The representative of the group, Pascaline Akoua (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 40 years old. She is married to Etienne. The couple have three children, all enrolled in school and still under their parents' care. Pascaline Akoua lives together with her husband and her children. She did not attend school. The couple share in supporting the household. 

In order to contribute to covering the needs of the family, Pascaline Akoua has been selling plastic items, soap, cloth, and vegetable oil for eight years through the distribution system. She buys her wares in a marketplace in Benin. In order to respond to the needs of her ever growing clientele,  Pascaline Akoua is requesting, together with the other members of the group called JLOMAHUTON, a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan has been correctly reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy cloth and jerrycans of vegetable oil.

loans.name: Espoir Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ESPOIR est formé de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Catherine, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Catherine est âgée de 34 ans et est mariée à un électricien du nom de Geofroy. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Catherine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la famille. Il y a cinq ans que Catherine mène comme activité, la vente des conserves et des pâtes alimentaires pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d'affaire, Catherine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ESPOIR, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le crédit reçu antérieurement a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The ESPOIR group is made up of four persons who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Catherine, is the one who is raising her hand in the photo. She is 34 years old and married to an electrician named Geofroy. The couple have four children, all enrolled in school and still under their parents' care. Catherine lives together with her husband and children and helps her husband support the family. 

For five years, Catherine has been selling tinned goods and pasta to contribute to covering the needs of the family. Wishing to satisfy her clientele and grow her sales, Catherine is requesting, together with the other members of the group called ESPOIR, a second loan from ALIDé. The prior loan has been correctly reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy tinned goods and pasta.

loans.name: Ney Soraida

texts.es:
Ney tiene 33 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, vive en la ciudad de Pisaq de la provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Ney nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de artesanía de tipo bisutería, ella tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde elabora artesanía. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias a su empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

En esta oportunidad Ney requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales y también collares y aretes. Ney pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Ney is 33, and has two children.  She lives in the city of Pisaq, in Calca province, Cusco department, Peru.

Ney tells us that she sells costume jewelry handicrafts. She has a small workshop in her home, where she makes crafts. She has been in this busines for several years now, and it is going very well, thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

On this occasion, Ney needs the loan to buy materials, and also necklaces and earrings.  Ney belongs to the “Mosoq Ñusta” communal bank of Asociación Arariwa, and she is thankful for the opportunity provided by this means.  As well, she promises to make her payments in accordance with the loan schedule.

The members of the "Mosoq Ñusta" communal bank meet every month in Pisaq district, in Calca province (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a very important tourist and commercial area; for its traditional Inti Raymi festival; and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located there.

loans.use: To buy materials, and also necklaces and earrings.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia tiene 68 años de edad, tiene ocho hijos y vive en la ciudad de Pisaq de la provincia del Calca departamento del Cusco, Perú. Lucia se dedica a la venta de pan y tortas de forma ambulatoria en la avenida principal de la ciudad de Pisaq, ella requiere el préstamo para incrementar el capital del negocio y desea comprar insumos como por ejemplo harina, manteca, azúcar y otras cosas más que se necesitan para elaborar pan. Lucia pertenece al banco comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Los socios del Banco Comunal “Mosoq Ñusta” se reúne cada treinta en el distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Lucia is 68, and has eight children. She lives in the city of Pisaq, in Calca province, Cusco department, in Cusco, Peru. Lucía is a street vendor selling bread and cakes on the main avenue of Pisaq.  

She needs the loan to increase her working capital, and wishes to buy ingredients such as flour, lard, sugar, and other things needed to to make bread. 

Lucia belongs to the "Mosoq Ñusta" communal bank of Asociación Arariwa, and she is thankful for the opportunity provided to her through this means. As well, she promises to make her payments in accordance with the loan schedule.

The members of the "Mosoq Ñusta" communal bank meet every month in Pisaq district, in Calca province (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a very important tourist and commercial area; for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located there.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as flour, lard, sugar, and other things.

loans.name: Tres Marias Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece  al banco comunal TRES MARIAS; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.

La socia Triolinda tiene 39 años es casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual  mediante este la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia, 
la socia trabaja todos los días en su negocio para de esta manera brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de mas mercaderia para su negocio como arroz, azucar, leche, huevos, gaseosas entre otros y de esta manera tener mas variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.

Los otros socios se dedican a la compra y venta de leña, brindar el servicio de taxi, venta  de fruta, venta de productos de primera necesidad masivo.

En esta oportunidad algunos socios continuan en el banco comunal y otros se retiraron por motivos personales como la socia Valentina. 

La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.

La socia pertenece  al banco comunal TRES MARIAS; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.
texts.en:
The member belongs to Tres Marías Communal Bank, located in the district of Wanchaq in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.  The member, Triolinda, is 39 years old and married, with two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business.  She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, candy, and sodas, among others.  She has been in this business for years, and with it she gets her family ahead.  She is a very happy and responsible person who very much wants to get ahead for her family.  She works every day in her business so she can give her family a better quality of life.

She is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise for her business such as rice, sugar, milk, eggs, and soda, among other things, and in this way have a greater variety of products to offer her customers.

The other members work buying and selling firewood, offering taxi service, selling fruit, and selling basic household necessities.  This time some members are staying with the communal bank and others left for personal reasons, such as the member Valentina.

She is grateful for this means by which the loan is given to her and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business such as rice, sugar, milk, eggs, and soda, to have greater variety for her customers.

loans.name: Ibet

texts.es: Ibet   de 53 años de edad es una mujer viuda que vive en la ciudad de Barranquilla y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 29 a 31 años. Ella emprendió su propia aventura de negocios  de  venta de comidas, corrientes y asados, actividad que inició ofreciendo almuerzos entre sus vecinos y hoy ha logrado crecer, entechando su terraza y ubicando sillas donde atienden a sus clientes. Su negocio está ubicado en un corredor muy comercial por eso es muy conocido en el barrio y como prepara deliciosos almuerzos que vende diariamente  y asados que prepara los fines de semas; de esta manera  sus actuales clientes le recomiendan nuevos compradores y así ha logrado sostenerse y generar ingresos para el bienestar de su familia. Su credikiva es el segundo financiamiento que recibe de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual  realizó adecuaciones de su local porque puso la cubierta a gran parte de él;  ahora Ibet brinda más comodidad a sus clientes y desde que recibió su  primer crédito se ha incrementado el número de ellos y ha tenido que comprar más sillas y mesas y con esas nuevas utilidades ha hecho mejoras a su vivienda, generando un ambiente familiar agradable. En la actualidad está aplicando a un primer credikiva  con  cual  terminará el entechado de su negocio, mejorando poco a poco la infraestructura de él y dándole así mayor formalidad. Su mensaje a la Fundación es el siguiente: “Estoy muy contento con el crédito y el apoyo que me ha dado la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y ahora con Kiva, para seguir adelante con mi negocio. ¡Gracias!
texts.en:
Ibet is 53 years old and is a widow. She lives in the city of Barranquilla and has 3 children between the ages of 29 and 31 years old. She started her own business venture selling food, cooked meals and grilled meats. She started by offering lunches to her neighbors, and now her business has grown so that she has put a roof over her terrace to have a place where she can serve her customers. Her business is located in a commercial corridor that is well known in the neighborhood for having delicious lunches that are sold daily and grilled meats that are prepared on the weekends. Her business has grown because her current customers always recommend new customers, which has allowed her to sustain herself and make a profit for the well-being of her family.    

Her Kiva loan is the second loan that she will receive through the 'Fundación Mario Santo Domingo'. The first loan she used to make improvements to her restaurant, making a covering for a large part of it. Now Ibet provides more comfort to her customers. Since the first loan that she took out she has increased her number of customers and has had to put more chairs and tables. With these new purchases she has made improvements to her location, giving it a friendly and enjoyable environment.  

Currently she is requesting a loan which will be her first loan from Kiva, which she will use to finish the roof on her business. Little by little she is improving the infrastructure of her business and making it more formal. Her message to the foundation is the following: "I am very happy with the loan and the support that the 'Fundación Mario Santo Domingo' has given me and now with Kiva, to continue moving ahead with my business. Thank you!"

loans.use: to finish the roofing on her business, improving the infrastructure little by little.

loans.name: Henry K.

texts.en: Henry is 39 years old and lives in West Point, Liberia. He is married and has three children ages 7 to 25. They are presently in school and live at home. For the past eight years he has been operating a fast food shop (food "Ca-face") in his community. He has a lot of customers and makes a lot of profit since he is the only one with a fast food business in his community, especially during the rainy season. He is requesting a loan to purchase more oats, cream-of-wheat, label tea, over-tea, milk, and many other items for his business. He plans to expand his business and send his children to a quality school.

loans.use: to purchase more oats, cream-of-wheat, label tea, over-tea, milk, and many other items for his business

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is 57 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Elma runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. She has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future Elma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Narcisa works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from fishing. Narcisa is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish for her fish vending business.

Narcisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Johanna Carol

texts.es: Johanna de 33 años de edad vive al sur de la ciudad en un barrio muy tradicional que combina espacios productivos formales e informales, actividades financieras y de comercio en general.Ella  tiene un hijo de 6 años de edad   con el que sueña ver convertido en un profesional exitoso y con este propósito trabaja día a día, en su propio negocio el cual inició después de ha ver quedado desempleada, ella aunque tenia conocimientos básicos en la preparación de productos derivados de la harina de trigo, hizo una capacitación  en técnicas de panadería y repostería para perfeccionar su arte y lograr la sostenibilidad de su emprendimiento, el cual inició hace 2 años. Su meta es tener su propio local donde pueda adecuar su taller y tener un punto comercial en ese mismo sitio, generando empleos en su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una batidora industrial de 5 libras, para lograr ampliar su productividad y competitividad, pues en la actualidad preparar sus productos manualmente.
texts.en: Johanna is 33 years old. She lives south of the city in a very traditional neighborhood that combines formal and informal businesses, financial activities and trade in general. She has a son who is 6 years old, whom she dreams will become a successful professional and with this in mind she works from day to day in her own business which she started after being unemployed. Even though she had basic knowledge of the preparation of products made from wheat flour, she took a course in bakery techniques and pastries to perfect her art and to obtain sustainability in her venture, which she started two years ago. Her goal is to have her own place where she can locate her shop and also have a store front in the same location, creating jobs in her family. She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan she has taken out through 'Fundación Mario Santo Domingo', with which she will buy an industrial  electric mixer with capacity of 5 pounds, to increase her production and competitiveness. She currently make her products by hand.

loans.use: to buy an industrial electric mixer with five-pound capacity.

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо ведущий специалист в бюджетной организации, которая имеет одну дочь, которая учится в средней школе в 9 классе на отлично.Её муж в отъезде в Россию на заработках, уже второй год. Недавно он позвонив сказал ей , что приезжает в ближайшие месяца. узнав об этом Мархабо решила  сделать сюрприз к его приезду , сделав мини ремонт. В основном она хочет побелить потолок кухни и заменить трубы на пластмассовые. Просит для своей цели 2000 сомони.
texts.en: Marhabo is a leading specialist at a budgetary organization.  She has one daughter, who is an excellent ninth-grade student at a secondary school.  Marhabo's husband is away working in Russia for the second year now.
